180#define DIRECTORY_CONTENTS_UPDATE_INTERVAL200 200 /* milliseconds */
181#define FILES_UPDATE_INTERVAL200 200 /* milliseconds */
182#define STANDARD_EMBLEM_HEIGHT52 52
183#define EMBLEM_LABEL_SPACING2 2
184
185/*
186 * A timeout before changes through the user/group combo box will be applied.
187 * When quickly changing owner/groups (i.e. by keyboard or scroll wheel),
188 * this ensures that the GUI doesn't end up unresponsive.
189 *
190 * Both combos react on changes by scheduling a new change and unscheduling
191 * or cancelling old pending changes.
192 */
193#define CHOWN_CHGRP_TIMEOUT300 300 /* milliseconds */

); __atomic_load (gapg_temp_atomic, &gapg_temp_newval, 5)

&static_g_define_type_id)); })) ) { GType g_define_type_id

235
236static gboolean
237is_multi_file_window (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
238{
239 GList *l;
240 int count;
241
242 count = 0;
243
244 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
245 if (!caja_file_is_gone (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))))) {
246 count++;
247 if (count > 1) {
248 return TRUE(!(0));
249 }
250 }
251 }
252
253 return FALSE(0);
254}
255
256static int
257get_not_gone_original_file_count (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
258{
259 GList *l;
260 int count;
261
262 count = 0;
263
264 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
265 if (!caja_file_is_gone (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))))) {
266 count++;
267 }
268 }
269
270 return count;
271}
272
273static CajaFile *
274get_original_file (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
275{
276 g_return_val_if_fail (!is_multi_file_window (window), NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_283
; if (!is_multi_file_window (window)) _g_boolean_var_283 = 1;
else _g_boolean_var_283 = 0; _g_boolean_var_283; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const char*
) (__func__)), "!is_multi_file_window (window)"); return (((void
*)0)); } } while (0);
277
278 if (window->details->original_files == NULL((void*)0)) {
279 return NULL((void*)0);
280 }
281
282 return CAJA_FILE (window->details->original_files->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((window->details->original_files
->data)))));
283}
284
285static CajaFile *
286get_target_file_for_original_file (CajaFile *file)
287{
288 CajaFile *target_file;
289
290 target_file = NULL((void*)0);
291 if (CAJA_IS_DESKTOP_ICON_FILE (file)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(file)); GType __t = (caja_desktop_icon_file_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
292 CajaDesktopLink *link;
293
294 link = caja_desktop_icon_file_get_link (CAJA_DESKTOP_ICON_FILE (file)((((CajaDesktopIconFile*) (void *) ((file))))));
295
296 if (link != NULL((void*)0)) {
297 GFile *location;
298
299 /* map to linked URI for these types of links */
300 location = caja_desktop_link_get_activation_location (link);
301
302 if (location) {
303 target_file = caja_file_get (location);
304 g_object_unref (location);
305 }
306
307 g_object_unref (link);
308 }
309 } else {
310 char *uri_to_display;
311
312 uri_to_display = caja_file_get_activation_uri (file);
313
314 if (uri_to_display != NULL((void*)0)) {
315 target_file = caja_file_get_by_uri (uri_to_display);
316 g_free (uri_to_display);
317 }
318 }
319
320 if (target_file != NULL((void*)0)) {
321 return target_file;
322 }
323
324 /* Ref passed-in file here since we've decided to use it. */
325 caja_file_ref (file);
326 return file;
327}
328
329static CajaFile *
330get_target_file (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
331{
332 return CAJA_FILE (window->details->target_files->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((window->details->target_files
->data)))));
333}
334
335static void
336add_prompt (GtkWidget *vbox, const char *prompt_text, gboolean pack_at_start)
337{
338 GtkWidget *prompt;
339
340 prompt = gtk_label_new (prompt_text);
341 gtk_label_set_justify (GTK_LABEL (prompt)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((prompt))))), GTK_JUSTIFY_LEFT);
342 gtk_label_set_line_wrap (GTK_LABEL (prompt)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((prompt))))), TRUE(!(0)));
343 gtk_widget_show (prompt);
344 if (pack_at_start) {
345 gtk_box_pack_start (GTK_BOX (vbox)((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((vbox))))), prompt, FALSE(0), FALSE(0), 0);
346 } else {
347 gtk_box_pack_end (GTK_BOX (vbox)((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((vbox))))), prompt, FALSE(0), FALSE(0), 0);
348 }
349}
350
351static void
352add_prompt_and_separator (GtkWidget *vbox, const char *prompt_text)
353{
354 GtkWidget *separator_line;
355
356 add_prompt (vbox, prompt_text, FALSE(0));
357
358 separator_line = gtk_separator_new (GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
359
360 gtk_widget_show (separator_line);
361 gtk_box_pack_end (GTK_BOX (vbox)((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((vbox))))), separator_line, TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)), 2*ROW_PAD6);
362}
363
364static void
365get_image_for_properties_window (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
366 char **icon_name,
367 GdkPixbuf **icon_pixbuf)
368{
369 CajaIconInfo *icon, *new_icon;
370 GList *l;
371 gint icon_scale;
372
373 icon = NULL((void*)0);
374 icon_scale = gtk_widget_get_scale_factor (GTK_WIDGET (window->details->notebook)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)))
)));
375
376 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
377 CajaFile *file;
378
379 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
380
381 if (!icon) {
382 icon = caja_file_get_icon (file, CAJA_ICON_SIZE_STANDARD48, icon_scale,
383 CAJA_FILE_ICON_FLAGS_USE_THUMBNAILS |
384 CAJA_FILE_ICON_FLAGS_IGNORE_VISITING);
385 } else {
386 new_icon = caja_file_get_icon (file, CAJA_ICON_SIZE_STANDARD48, icon_scale,
387 CAJA_FILE_ICON_FLAGS_USE_THUMBNAILS |
388 CAJA_FILE_ICON_FLAGS_IGNORE_VISITING);
389 if (!new_icon || new_icon != icon) {
390 g_object_unref (icon);
391 g_object_unref (new_icon);
392 icon = NULL((void*)0);
393 break;
394 }
395 g_object_unref (new_icon);
396 }
397 }
398
399 if (!icon) {
400 icon = caja_icon_info_lookup_from_name ("text-x-generic",
401 CAJA_ICON_SIZE_STANDARD48,
402 icon_scale);
403 }
404
405 if (icon_name != NULL((void*)0)) {
406 *icon_name = g_strdup (caja_icon_info_get_used_name (icon))g_strdup_inline (caja_icon_info_get_used_name (icon));
407 }
408
409 if (icon_pixbuf != NULL((void*)0)) {
410 *icon_pixbuf = caja_icon_info_get_pixbuf_at_size (icon, CAJA_ICON_SIZE_STANDARD48);
411 }
412
413 g_object_unref (icon);
414}
415
416static void
417update_properties_window_icon (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
418{
419 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
420 cairo_surface_t *surface;
421 char *name;
422
423 get_image_for_properties_window (window, &name, &pixbuf);
424
425 if (name != NULL((void*)0)) {
426 gtk_window_set_icon_name (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))), name);
427 } else {
428 gtk_window_set_icon (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))), pixbuf);
429 }
430
431 surface = gdk_cairo_surface_create_from_pixbuf (pixbuf, gtk_widget_get_scale_factor (GTK_WIDGET (window)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window)))))),
432 gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (window)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window)))))));
433 gtk_image_set_from_surface (GTK_IMAGE (window->details->icon_image)((((GtkImage*) (void *) ((window->details->icon_image))
))), surface);
434
435 g_free (name);
436 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
437 cairo_surface_destroy (surface);
438}
439
440/* utility to test if a uri refers to a local image */
441static gboolean
442uri_is_local_image (const char *uri)
443{
444 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
445 char *image_path;
446
447 image_path = g_filename_from_uri (uri, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
448 if (image_path == NULL((void*)0)) {
449 return FALSE(0);
450 }
451
452 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file (image_path, NULL((void*)0));
453 g_free (image_path);
454
455 if (pixbuf == NULL((void*)0)) {
456 return FALSE(0);
457 }
458 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
459 return TRUE(!(0));
460}
461
462static void
463reset_icon (FMPropertiesWindow *properties_window)
464{
465 GList *l;
466
467 for (l = properties_window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
468 CajaFile *file;
469
470 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
471
472 caja_file_set_metadata (file,
473 CAJA_METADATA_KEY_ICON_SCALE"icon-scale",
474 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
475 caja_file_set_metadata (file,
476 CAJA_METADATA_KEY_CUSTOM_ICON"custom-icon",
477 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
478 }
479}
480
481static void
482fm_properties_window_drag_data_received (GtkWidget *widget, GdkDragContext *context,
483 int x, int y,
484 GtkSelectionData *selection_data,
485 guint info, guint time)
486{
487 char **uris;
488 gboolean exactly_one;
489 GtkImage *image;
490 GtkWindow *window;
491
492 image = GTK_IMAGE (widget)((((GtkImage*) (void *) ((widget)))));
493 window = GTK_WINDOW (gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (image)))((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_get_toplevel (((((GtkWidget
*) (void *) ((image)))))))))));
494
495 if (info == TARGET_RESET_BACKGROUND) {
496 reset_icon (FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((window))))));
497
498 return;
499 }
500
501 uris = g_strsplit (gtk_selection_data_get_data (selection_data), "\r\n", 0);
502 exactly_one = uris[0] != NULL((void*)0) && (uris[1] == NULL((void*)0) || uris[1][0] == '\0');
503
504 if (!exactly_one) {
505 eel_show_error_dialog
506 (_("You cannot assign more than one custom icon at a time!")dcgettext (((void*)0), "You cannot assign more than one custom icon at a time!"
, 5),
507 _("Please drag just one image to set a custom icon.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Please drag just one image to set a custom icon."
, 5),
508 window);
509 } else {
510 if (uri_is_local_image (uris[0])) {
511 set_icon (uris[0], FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((window))))));
512 } else {
513 GFile *f;
514
515 f = g_file_new_for_uri (uris[0]);
516 if (!g_file_is_native (f)) {
517 eel_show_error_dialog
518 (_("The file that you dropped is not local.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "The file that you dropped is not local."
, 5),
519 _("You can only use local images as custom icons.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "You can only use local images as custom icons."
, 5),
520 window);
521
522 } else {
523 eel_show_error_dialog
524 (_("The file that you dropped is not an image.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "The file that you dropped is not an image."
, 5),
525 _("You can only use local images as custom icons.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "You can only use local images as custom icons."
, 5),
526 window);
527 }
528 g_object_unref (f);
529 }
530 }
531 g_strfreev (uris);
532}
533
534static GtkWidget *
535create_image_widget (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
536 gboolean is_customizable)
537{
538 GtkWidget *button;
539 GtkWidget *image;
540
541 image = gtk_image_new ();
542 window->details->icon_image = image;
543
544 update_properties_window_icon (window);
545 gtk_widget_show (image);
546
547 button = NULL((void*)0);
548 if (is_customizable) {
549 button = gtk_button_new ();
550 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (button)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((button))))), image);
551
552 /* prepare the image to receive dropped objects to assign custom images */
553 gtk_drag_dest_set (GTK_WIDGET (image)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((image))))),
554 GTK_DEST_DEFAULT_MOTION | GTK_DEST_DEFAULT_HIGHLIGHT | GTK_DEST_DEFAULT_DROP,
555 target_table, G_N_ELEMENTS (target_table)(sizeof (target_table) / sizeof ((target_table)[0])),
556 GDK_ACTION_COPY | GDK_ACTION_MOVE);
557
558 g_signal_connect (image, "drag_data_received",g_signal_connect_data ((image), ("drag_data_received"), (((GCallback
) (fm_properties_window_drag_data_received))), (((void*)0)), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
559 G_CALLBACK (fm_properties_window_drag_data_received), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((image), ("drag_data_received"), (((GCallback
) (fm_properties_window_drag_data_received))), (((void*)0)), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
560 g_signal_connect (button, "clicked",g_signal_connect_data ((button), ("clicked"), (((GCallback) (
select_image_button_callback))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
561 G_CALLBACK (select_image_button_callback), window)g_signal_connect_data ((button), ("clicked"), (((GCallback) (
select_image_button_callback))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
562 }
563
564 window->details->icon_button = button;
565
566 return button != NULL((void*)0) ? button : image;
567}
568
569static void
570set_name_field (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
571 const gchar *original_name,
572 const gchar *name)
573{
574 gboolean new_widget;
575 gboolean use_label;
576
577 /* There are four cases here:
578 * 1) Changing the text of a label
579 * 2) Changing the text of an entry
580 * 3) Creating label (potentially replacing entry)
581 * 4) Creating entry (potentially replacing label)
582 */
583 use_label = is_multi_file_window (window) || !caja_file_can_rename (get_original_file (window));
584 new_widget = !window->details->name_field || (use_label ? CAJA_IS_ENTRY (window->details->name_field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(window->details->name_field)); GType __t = (caja_entry_get_type
()); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) : GTK_IS_LABEL (window->details->name_field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(window->details->name_field)); GType __t = ((gtk_label_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))));
585
586 if (new_widget) {
587 if (window->details->name_field) {
588 gtk_widget_destroy (window->details->name_field);
589 }
590
591 if (use_label) {
592 window->details->name_field = GTK_WIDGET((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((attach_ellipsizing_value_label (window
->details->basic_grid, ((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window
->details->name_label))))), name))))))
593 (attach_ellipsizing_value_label (window->details->basic_grid,((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((attach_ellipsizing_value_label (window
->details->basic_grid, ((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window
->details->name_label))))), name))))))
594 GTK_WIDGET (window->details->name_label),((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((attach_ellipsizing_value_label (window
->details->basic_grid, ((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window
->details->name_label))))), name))))))
595 name))((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((attach_ellipsizing_value_label (window
->details->basic_grid, ((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window
->details->name_label))))), name))))));
596
597 } else {
598 window->details->name_field = caja_entry_new ();
599 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (window->details->name_field)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field))
))), name);
600 gtk_widget_show (window->details->name_field);
601 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (window->details->basic_grid, window->details->name_field,
602 GTK_WIDGET (window->details->name_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window->details->name_label)
)))),
603 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 1);
604
605 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (GTK_LABEL (window->details->name_label)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((window->details->name_label))
))), window->details->name_field);
606
607 g_signal_connect_object (window->details->name_field, "focus_out_event",
608 G_CALLBACK (name_field_focus_out)((GCallback) (name_field_focus_out)), window, 0);
609 g_signal_connect_object (window->details->name_field, "activate",
610 G_CALLBACK (name_field_activate)((GCallback) (name_field_activate)), window, 0);
611 }
612
613 gtk_widget_show (window->details->name_field);
614 }
615 /* Only replace text if the file's name has changed. */
616 else if (original_name == NULL((void*)0) || strcmp (original_name, name) != 0) {
617
618 if (use_label) {
619 gtk_label_set_text (GTK_LABEL (window->details->name_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field))
))), name);
620 } else {
621 /* Only reset the text if it's different from what is
622 * currently showing. This causes minimal ripples (e.g.
623 * selection change).
624 */
625 gchar *displayed_name = gtk_editable_get_chars (GTK_EDITABLE (window->details->name_field)((((GtkEditable*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field
))))), 0, -1);
626 if (strcmp (displayed_name, name) != 0) {
627 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (window->details->name_field)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field))
))), name);
628 }
629 g_free (displayed_name);
630 }
631 }
632}
633
634static void
635update_name_field (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
636{
637 CajaFile *file;
638
639 gtk_label_set_text_with_mnemonic (window->details->name_label,
640 ngettext ("_Name:", "_Names:",dcngettext (((void*)0), "_Name:", "_Names:", get_not_gone_original_file_count
(window), 5)
641 get_not_gone_original_file_count (window))dcngettext (((void*)0), "_Name:", "_Names:", get_not_gone_original_file_count
(window), 5));
642
643 if (is_multi_file_window (window)) {
644 /* Multifile property dialog, show all names */
645 GString *str;
646 char *name;
647 gboolean first;
648 GList *l;
649
650 str = g_string_new ("");
651
652 first = TRUE(!(0));
653
654 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
655 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
656
657 if (!caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
658 if (!first) {
659 g_string_append (str, ", ")(__builtin_constant_p (", ") ? __extension__ ({ const char * const
__val = (", "); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_284; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_284 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_284 = 0; _g_boolean_var_284
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, ", ", (gssize) -1
));
660 }
661 first = FALSE(0);
662
663 name = caja_file_get_display_name (file);
664 g_string_append (str, name)(__builtin_constant_p (name) ? __extension__ ({ const char * const
__val = (name); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_285; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_285 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_285 = 0; _g_boolean_var_285
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, name, (gssize) -1
));
665 g_free (name);
666 }
667 }
668 set_name_field (window, NULL((void*)0), str->str);
669 g_string_free (str, TRUE)(__builtin_constant_p ((!(0))) ? (((!(0))) ? (g_string_free) (
(str), ((!(0)))) : g_string_free_and_steal (str)) : (g_string_free
) ((str), ((!(0)))));
670 } else {
671 const char *original_name = NULL((void*)0);
672 char *current_name;
673
674 file = get_original_file (window);
675
676 if (file == NULL((void*)0) || caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
677 current_name = g_strdup ("")g_strdup_inline ("");
678 } else {
679 current_name = caja_file_get_display_name (file);
680 }
681
682 /* If the file name has changed since the original name was stored,
683 * update the text in the text field, possibly (deliberately) clobbering
684 * an edit in progress. If the name hasn't changed (but some other
685 * aspect of the file might have), then don't clobber changes.
686 */
687 if (window->details->name_field) {
688 original_name = (const char *) g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (window->details->name_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field)))
)), "original_name");
689 }
690
691 set_name_field (window, original_name, current_name);
692
693 if (original_name == NULL((void*)0) ||
694 g_strcmp0 (original_name, current_name) != 0) {
695 g_object_set_data_full (G_OBJECT (window->details->name_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field)))
)),
696 "original_name",
697 current_name,
698 g_free);
699 } else {
700 g_free (current_name);
701 }
702 }
703}
704
705static void
706name_field_restore_original_name (CajaEntry *name_field)
707{
708 const char *original_name;
709 char *displayed_name;
710
711 original_name = (const char *) g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (name_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((name_field))))),
712 "original_name");
713
714 if (!original_name) {
715 return;
716 }
717
718 displayed_name = gtk_editable_get_chars (GTK_EDITABLE (name_field)((((GtkEditable*) (void *) ((name_field))))), 0, -1);
719
720 if (strcmp (original_name, displayed_name) != 0) {
721 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (name_field)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((name_field))))), original_name);
722 }
723 caja_entry_select_all (name_field);
724
725 g_free (displayed_name);
726}
727
728static void
729rename_callback (CajaFile *file, GFile *res_loc, GError *error, gpointer callback_data)
730{
731 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
732
733 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((callback_data)))));
734
735 /* Complain to user if rename failed. */
736 if (error != NULL((void*)0)) {
737 fm_report_error_renaming_file (file,
738 window->details->pending_name,
739 error,
740 GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))));
741 if (window->details->name_field != NULL((void*)0)) {
742 name_field_restore_original_name (CAJA_ENTRY (window->details->name_field)((((CajaEntry*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field)
)))));
743 }
744 }
745
746 g_object_unref (window);
747}
748
749static void
750set_pending_name (FMPropertiesWindow *window, const char *name)
751{
752 g_free (window->details->pending_name);
753 window->details->pending_name = g_strdup (name)g_strdup_inline (name);
754}
755
756static void
757name_field_done_editing (CajaEntry *name_field, FMPropertiesWindow *window)
758{
759 CajaFile *file;
760 char *new_name;
761
762 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ENTRY (name_field))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_286
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((name_field)); GType __t = (caja_entry_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_286
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_286 = 0; _g_boolean_var_286; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ENTRY (name_field)"); return; }
} while (0);
763
764 /* Don't apply if the dialog has more than one file */
765 if (is_multi_file_window (window)) {
766 return;
767 }
768
769 file = get_original_file (window);
770
771 /* This gets called when the window is closed, which might be
772 * caused by the file having been deleted.
773 */
774 if (file == NULL((void*)0) || caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
775 return;
776 }
777
778 new_name = gtk_editable_get_chars (GTK_EDITABLE (name_field)((((GtkEditable*) (void *) ((name_field))))), 0, -1);
779
780 /* Special case: silently revert text if new text is empty. */
781 if (strlen (new_name) == 0) {
782 name_field_restore_original_name (CAJA_ENTRY (name_field)((((CajaEntry*) (void *) ((name_field))))));
783 } else {
784 const char *original_name;
785
786 original_name = (const char *) g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (window->details->name_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window->details->name_field)))
)),
787 "original_name");
788 /* Don't rename if not changed since we read the display name.
789 This is needed so that we don't save the display name to the
790 file when nothing is changed */
791 if (strcmp (new_name, original_name) != 0) {
792 set_pending_name (window, new_name);
793 g_object_ref (window)((__typeof__ (window)) (g_object_ref) (window));
794 caja_file_rename (file, new_name,
795 rename_callback, window);
796 }
797 }
798
799 g_free (new_name);
800}
801
802static gboolean
803name_field_focus_out (CajaEntry *name_field,
804 GdkEventFocus *event,
805 gpointer callback_data)
806{
807 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_287
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((callback_data)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type
()); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_287 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_287 =
0; _g_boolean_var_287; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 807, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)"); } while
(0);
808
809 if (gtk_widget_get_sensitive (GTK_WIDGET (name_field)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((name_field))))))) {
810 name_field_done_editing (name_field, FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((callback_data))))));
811 }
812
813 return FALSE(0);
814}
815
816static void
817name_field_activate (CajaEntry *name_field, gpointer callback_data)
818{
819 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ENTRY (name_field))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_288
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((name_field)); GType __t = (caja_entry_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_288
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_288 = 0; _g_boolean_var_288; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 819, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ENTRY (name_field)"
); } while (0);
820 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_289
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((callback_data)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type
()); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_289 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_289 =
0; _g_boolean_var_289; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 820, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)"); } while
(0);
821
822 /* Accept changes. */
823 name_field_done_editing (name_field, FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((callback_data))))));
824
825 caja_entry_select_all_at_idle (name_field);
826}
827
828static gboolean
829file_has_keyword (CajaFile *file, const char *keyword)
830{
831 GList *keywords, *word;
832
833 keywords = caja_file_get_keywords (file);
834 word = g_list_find_custom (keywords, keyword, (GCompareFunc) strcmp);
835 g_list_free_full (keywords, g_free);
836
837 return (word != NULL((void*)0));
838}
839
840static void
841get_initial_emblem_state (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
842 const char *name,
843 GList **on,
844 GList **off)
845{
846 GList *l;
847
848 *on = NULL((void*)0);
849 *off = NULL((void*)0);
850
851 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
852 GList *initial_emblems;
853
854 initial_emblems = g_hash_table_lookup (window->details->initial_emblems,
855 l->data);
856
857 if (g_list_find_custom (initial_emblems, name, (GCompareFunc) strcmp)) {
858 *on = g_list_prepend (*on, l->data);
859 } else {
860 *off = g_list_prepend (*off, l->data);
861 }
862 }
863}
864
865static void
866emblem_button_toggled (GtkToggleButton *button,
867 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
868{
869 GList *l;
870 GList *keywords;
871 GList *word;
872 char *name;
873 GList *files_on;
874 GList *files_off;
875
876 name = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (button)((((GObject*) (void *) ((button))))), "caja_emblem_name");
877
878 files_on = NULL((void*)0);
879 files_off = NULL((void*)0);
880 if (gtk_toggle_button_get_active (button)
881 && !gtk_toggle_button_get_inconsistent (button)) {
882 /* Go to the initial state unless the initial state was
883 consistent */
884 get_initial_emblem_state (window, name,
885 &files_on, &files_off);
886
887 if (!(files_on && files_off)) {
888 g_list_free (files_on);
889 g_list_free (files_off);
890 files_on = g_list_copy (window->details->original_files);
891 files_off = NULL((void*)0);
892 }
893 } else if (gtk_toggle_button_get_inconsistent (button)
894 && !gtk_toggle_button_get_active (button)) {
895 files_on = g_list_copy (window->details->original_files);
896 files_off = NULL((void*)0);
897 } else {
898 files_off = g_list_copy (window->details->original_files);
899 files_on = NULL((void*)0);
900 }
901
902 g_signal_handlers_block_by_func (G_OBJECT (button),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
903 G_CALLBACK (emblem_button_toggled),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
904 window)g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window));
905
906 gtk_toggle_button_set_active (button, files_on != NULL((void*)0));
907 gtk_toggle_button_set_inconsistent (button, files_on && files_off);
908
909 g_signal_handlers_unblock_by_func (G_OBJECT (button),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
910 G_CALLBACK (emblem_button_toggled),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
911 window)g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window));
912
913 for (l = files_on; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
914 CajaFile *file;
915
916 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
917
918 keywords = caja_file_get_keywords (file);
919
920 word = g_list_find_custom (keywords, name, (GCompareFunc)strcmp);
921 if (!word) {
922 keywords = g_list_prepend (keywords, g_strdup (name)g_strdup_inline (name));
923 }
924 caja_file_set_keywords (file, keywords);
925 g_list_free_full (keywords, g_free);
926 }
927
928 for (l = files_off; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
929 CajaFile *file;
930
931 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
932
933 keywords = caja_file_get_keywords (file);
934
935 word = g_list_find_custom (keywords, name, (GCompareFunc)strcmp);
936 if (word) {
937 keywords = g_list_remove_link (keywords, word);
938 g_list_free_full (word, g_free);
939 }
940 caja_file_set_keywords (file, keywords);
941 g_list_free_full (keywords, g_free);
942 }
943
944 g_list_free (files_on);
945 g_list_free (files_off);
946}
947
948static void
949emblem_button_update (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
950 GtkToggleButton *button)
951{
952 GList *l;
953 char *name;
954 gboolean all_set;
955 gboolean all_unset;
956
957 name = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (button)((((GObject*) (void *) ((button))))), "caja_emblem_name");
958
959 all_set = TRUE(!(0));
960 all_unset = TRUE(!(0));
961 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
962 gboolean has_keyword;
963 CajaFile *file;
964
965 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
966
967 has_keyword = file_has_keyword (file, name);
968
969 if (has_keyword) {
970 all_unset = FALSE(0);
971 } else {
972 all_set = FALSE(0);
973 }
974 }
975
976 g_signal_handlers_block_by_func (G_OBJECT (button),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
977 G_CALLBACK (emblem_button_toggled),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
978 window)g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((button
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window));
979
980 gtk_toggle_button_set_active (button, !all_unset);
981 gtk_toggle_button_set_inconsistent (button, !all_unset && !all_set);
982
983 g_signal_handlers_unblock_by_func (G_OBJECT (button),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
984 G_CALLBACK (emblem_button_toggled),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window))
985 window)g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (emblem_button_toggled))),
(window));
986
987}
988
989static void
990update_properties_window_title (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
991{
992 char *title;
993
994 g_return_if_fail (GTK_IS_WINDOW (window))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_290
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = ((gtk_window_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_290
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_290 = 0; _g_boolean_var_290; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_WINDOW (window)"); return; } } while
(0);
995
996 title = g_strdup_printf (_("Properties")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Properties", 5));
997
998 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)) {
999 CajaFile *file;
1000
1001 file = get_original_file (window);
1002
1003 if (file != NULL((void*)0)) {
1004 char *name;
1005
1006 g_free (title);
1007 name = caja_file_get_display_name (file);
1008 title = g_strdup_printf (_("%s Properties")dcgettext (((void*)0), "%s Properties", 5), name);
1009 g_free (name);
1010 }
1011 }
1012
1013 gtk_window_set_title (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))), title);
1014
1015 g_free (title);
1016}
1017
1018static void
1019clear_extension_pages (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1020{
1021 int i;
1022 int num_pages;
1023 GtkWidget *page = NULL((void*)0);
1024
1025 num_pages = gtk_notebook_get_n_pages
1026 (GTK_NOTEBOOK (window->details->notebook)((((GtkNotebook*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)
)))));
1027
1028 for (i = 0; i < num_pages; i++) {
1029 page = gtk_notebook_get_nth_page
1030 (GTK_NOTEBOOK (window->details->notebook)((((GtkNotebook*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)
)))), i);
1031
1032 if (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (page)((((GObject*) (void *) ((page))))), "is-extension-page")) {
1033 gtk_notebook_remove_page
1034 (GTK_NOTEBOOK (window->details->notebook)((((GtkNotebook*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)
)))), i);
1035 num_pages--;
1036 i--;
1037 }
1038 }
1039}
1040
1041static void
1042refresh_extension_pages (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1043{
1044 clear_extension_pages (window);
1045 append_extension_pages (window);
1046}
1047
1048static void
1049remove_from_dialog (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1050 CajaFile *file)
1051{
1052 int index;
1053 GList *original_link;
1054 GList *target_link;
1055 CajaFile *original_file;
1056 CajaFile *target_file;
1057
1058 index = g_list_index (window->details->target_files, file);
1059 if (index == -1) {
1060 index = g_list_index (window->details->original_files, file);
1061 g_return_if_fail (index != -1)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_291
; if (index != -1) _g_boolean_var_291 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_291
= 0; _g_boolean_var_291; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "index != -1"); return
; } } while (0);
1062 }
1063
1064 original_link = g_list_nth (window->details->original_files, index);
1065 target_link = g_list_nth (window->details->target_files, index);
1066
1067 g_return_if_fail (original_link && target_link)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_292
; if (original_link && target_link) _g_boolean_var_292
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_292 = 0; _g_boolean_var_292; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "original_link && target_link");
return; } } while (0);
1068
1069 original_file = CAJA_FILE (original_link->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((original_link->data)))));
1070 target_file = CAJA_FILE (target_link->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((target_link->data)))));
1071
1072 window->details->original_files = g_list_remove_link (window->details->original_files, original_link);
1073 g_list_free (original_link);
1074
1075 window->details->target_files = g_list_remove_link (window->details->target_files, target_link);
1076 g_list_free (target_link);
1077
1078 g_hash_table_remove (window->details->initial_emblems, original_file);
1079 g_hash_table_remove (window->details->initial_permissions, target_file);
1080
1081 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func (original_file,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((original_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window))
1082 G_CALLBACK (file_changed_callback),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((original_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window))
1083 window)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((original_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window));
1084 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func (target_file,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((target_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window))
1085 G_CALLBACK (file_changed_callback),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((target_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window))
1086 window)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((target_file), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (file_changed_callback))), (window));
1087
1088 caja_file_monitor_remove (original_file, &window->details->original_files);
1089 caja_file_monitor_remove (target_file, &window->details->target_files);
1090
1091 caja_file_unref (original_file);
1092 caja_file_unref (target_file);
1093
1094}
1095
1096static gboolean
1097mime_list_equal (GList *a, GList *b)
1098{
1099 while (a && b) {
1100 if (strcmp (a->data, b->data)) {
1101 return FALSE(0);
1102 }
1103 a = a->next;
1104 b = b->next;
1105 }
1106
1107 return (a == b);
1108}
1109
1110static GList *
1111get_mime_list (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1112{
1113 GList *ret;
1114 GList *l;
1115
1116 ret = NULL((void*)0);
1117 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1118 ret = g_list_append (ret, caja_file_get_mime_type (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))))));
1119 }
1120 ret = g_list_reverse (ret);
1121 return ret;
1122}
1123
1124static void
1125properties_window_update (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1126 GList *files)
1127{
1128 GList *l;
1129 GList *mime_list;
1130 GList *tmp;
1131 CajaFile *changed_file = NULL((void*)0);
1132 gboolean dirty_original = FALSE(0);
1133 gboolean dirty_target = FALSE(0);
1134
1135 if (files == NULL((void*)0)) {
1136 dirty_original = TRUE(!(0));
1137 dirty_target = TRUE(!(0));
1138 }
1139
1140 for (tmp = files; tmp != NULL((void*)0); tmp = tmp->next) {
1141 changed_file = CAJA_FILE (tmp->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((tmp->data)))));
1142
1143 if (changed_file && caja_file_is_gone (changed_file)) {
1144 /* Remove the file from the property dialog */
1145 remove_from_dialog (window, changed_file);
1146 changed_file = NULL((void*)0);
1147
1148 if (window->details->original_files == NULL((void*)0)) {
1149 return;
1150 }
1151 }
1152 if (changed_file == NULL((void*)0) ||
1153 g_list_find (window->details->original_files, changed_file)) {
1154 dirty_original = TRUE(!(0));
1155 }
1156 if (changed_file == NULL((void*)0) ||
1157 g_list_find (window->details->target_files, changed_file)) {
1158 dirty_target = TRUE(!(0));
1159 }
1160
1161 }
1162
1163 if (dirty_original) {
1164 update_properties_window_title (window);
1165 update_properties_window_icon (window);
1166 update_name_field (window);
1167
1168 for (l = window->details->emblem_buttons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1169 emblem_button_update (window, GTK_TOGGLE_BUTTON (l->data)((((GtkToggleButton*) (void *) ((l->data))))));
1170 }
1171
1172 /* If any of the value fields start to depend on the original
1173 * value, value_field_updates should be added here */
1174 }
1175
1176 if (dirty_target) {
1177 for (l = window->details->permission_buttons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1178 permission_button_update (window, GTK_TOGGLE_BUTTON (l->data)((((GtkToggleButton*) (void *) ((l->data))))));
1179 }
1180
1181 for (l = window->details->permission_combos; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1182 permission_combo_update (window, GTK_COMBO_BOX (l->data)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((l->data))))));
1183 }
1184
1185 for (l = window->details->value_fields; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1186 value_field_update (window, GTK_LABEL (l->data)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((l->data))))));
1187 }
1188 }
1189
1190 mime_list = get_mime_list (window);
1191
1192 if (!window->details->mime_list) {
1193 window->details->mime_list = mime_list;
1194 } else {
1195 if (!mime_list_equal (window->details->mime_list, mime_list)) {
1196 refresh_extension_pages (window);
1197 }
1198
1199 g_list_free_full (window->details->mime_list, g_free);
1200 window->details->mime_list = mime_list;
1201 }
1202}
1203
1204static gboolean
1205update_files_callback (gpointer data)
1206{
1207 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
1208
1209 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((data)))));
1210
1211 window->details->update_files_timeout_id = 0;
1212
1213 properties_window_update (window, window->details->changed_files);
1214
1215 if (window->details->original_files == NULL((void*)0)) {
1216 /* Close the window if no files are left */
1217 gtk_widget_destroy (GTK_WIDGET (window)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window))))));
1218 } else {
1219 caja_file_list_free (window->details->changed_files);
1220 window->details->changed_files = NULL((void*)0);
1221 }
1222
1223 return FALSE(0);
1224 }
1225
1226static void
1227schedule_files_update (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1228 {
1229 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_293
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_293 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_293 = 0; _g_boolean_var_293
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1229, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
1230
1231 if (window->details->update_files_timeout_id == 0) {
1232 window->details->update_files_timeout_id
1233 = g_timeout_add (FILES_UPDATE_INTERVAL200,
1234 update_files_callback,
1235 window);
1236 }
1237 }
1238
1239static gboolean
1240file_list_attributes_identical (GList *file_list, const char *attribute_name)
1241{
1242 gboolean identical;
1243 char *first_attr;
1244 GList *l;
1245
1246 first_attr = NULL((void*)0);
1247 identical = TRUE(!(0));
1248
1249 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1250 CajaFile *file;
1251
1252 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
1253
1254 if (caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
1255 continue;
1256 }
1257
1258 if (first_attr == NULL((void*)0)) {
1259 first_attr = caja_file_get_string_attribute_with_default (file, attribute_name);
1260 } else {
1261 char *attr;
1262 attr = caja_file_get_string_attribute_with_default (file, attribute_name);
1263 if (strcmp (attr, first_attr)) {
1264 identical = FALSE(0);
1265 g_free (attr);
1266 break;
1267 }
1268 g_free (attr);
1269 }
1270 }
1271
1272 g_free (first_attr);
1273 return identical;
1274}
1275
1276static char *
1277file_list_get_string_attribute (GList *file_list,
1278 const char *attribute_name,
1279 const char *inconsistent_value)
1280{
1281 if (file_list_attributes_identical (file_list, attribute_name)) {
1282 GList *l;
1283
1284 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1285 CajaFile *file;
1286
1287 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
1288 if (!caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
1289 return caja_file_get_string_attribute_with_default
1290 (file,
1291 attribute_name);
1292 }
1293 }
1294 return g_strdup (_("unknown"))g_strdup_inline (dcgettext (((void*)0), "unknown", 5));
1295 } else {
1296 return g_strdup (inconsistent_value)g_strdup_inline (inconsistent_value);
1297 }
1298}
1299
1300static gboolean
1301file_list_all_directories (GList *file_list)
1302{
1303 GList *l;
1304 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
1305 if (!caja_file_is_directory (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))))) {
1306 return FALSE(0);
1307 }
1308 }
1309 return TRUE(!(0));
1310}
1311
1312static void
1313value_field_update_internal (GtkLabel *label,
1314 GList *file_list)
1315{
1316 const char *attribute_name;
1317 char *attribute_value;
1318 char *inconsistent_string;
1319
1320 g_assert (GTK_IS_LABEL (label))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_294
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((label)); GType __t = ((gtk_label_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_294
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_294 = 0; _g_boolean_var_294; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1320, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_LABEL (label)"); }
while (0);
1321
1322 attribute_name = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (label)((((GObject*) (void *) ((label))))), "file_attribute");
1323 inconsistent_string = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (label)((((GObject*) (void *) ((label))))), "inconsistent_string");
1324 attribute_value = file_list_get_string_attribute (file_list,
1325 attribute_name,
1326 inconsistent_string);
1327 if (!strcmp (attribute_name, "type") && strcmp (attribute_value, inconsistent_string)) {
1328 char *mime_type;
1329
1330 mime_type = file_list_get_string_attribute (file_list,
1331 "mime_type",
1332 inconsistent_string);
1333 if (strcmp (mime_type, inconsistent_string)) {
1334 char *tmp;
1335
1336 tmp = attribute_value;
1337 attribute_value = g_strdup_printf (C_("MIME type description (MIME type)", "%s (%s)")g_dpgettext (((void*)0), "MIME type description (MIME type)" "\004"
"%s (%s)", strlen ("MIME type description (MIME type)") + 1), attribute_value, mime_type);
1338 g_free (tmp);
1339 }
1340 g_free (mime_type);
1341 }
1342
1343 gtk_label_set_text (label, attribute_value);
1344 g_free (attribute_value);
1345}
1346
1347static void
1348value_field_update (FMPropertiesWindow *window, GtkLabel *label)
1349{
1350 gboolean use_original;
1351
1352 use_original = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (label), "show_original"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
label))))), "show_original")));
1353
1354 value_field_update_internal (label,
1355 (use_original ?
1356 window->details->original_files :
1357 window->details->target_files));
1358}
1359
1360static GtkLabel *
1361attach_label (GtkGrid *grid,
1362 GtkWidget *sibling,
1363 const char *initial_text,
1364 gboolean ellipsize_text,
1365 gboolean selectable,
1366 gboolean mnemonic)
1367{
1368 GtkWidget *label_field;
1369
1370 if (ellipsize_text) {
1371 label_field = gtk_label_new (initial_text);
1372 gtk_label_set_ellipsize (GTK_LABEL (label_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((label_field))))),
1373 PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_END);
1374 } else if (mnemonic) {
1375 label_field = gtk_label_new_with_mnemonic (initial_text);
1376 } else {
1377 label_field = gtk_label_new (initial_text);
1378 }
1379
1380 if (selectable) {
1381 gtk_label_set_selectable (GTK_LABEL (label_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((label_field))))), TRUE(!(0)));
1382 }
1383
1384 gtk_label_set_xalign (GTK_LABEL (label_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((label_field))))), 0);
1385 gtk_widget_show (label_field);
1386 if (ellipsize_text) {
1387 gtk_widget_set_hexpand (label_field, TRUE(!(0)));
1388 gtk_label_set_max_width_chars (GTK_LABEL (label_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((label_field))))), 24);
1389 }
1390
1391 if (sibling != NULL((void*)0)) {
1392 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (grid, label_field, sibling,
1393 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 1);
1394 } else {
1395 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (grid)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((grid))))), label_field);
1396 }
1397
1398 return GTK_LABEL (label_field)((((GtkLabel*) (void *) ((label_field)))));
1399}
1400
1401static GtkLabel *
1402attach_value_label (GtkGrid *grid,
1403 GtkWidget *sibling,
1404 const char *initial_text)
1405{
1406 return attach_label (grid, sibling, initial_text, FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), FALSE(0));
1407}
1408
1409static GtkLabel *
1410attach_ellipsizing_value_label (GtkGrid *grid,
1411 GtkWidget *sibling,
1412 const char *initial_text)
1413{
1414 return attach_label (grid, sibling, initial_text, TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)), FALSE(0));
1415}
1416
1417static GtkWidget*
1418attach_value_field_internal (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1419 GtkGrid *grid,
1420 GtkWidget *sibling,
1421 const char *file_attribute_name,
1422 const char *inconsistent_string,
1423 gboolean show_original,
1424 gboolean ellipsize_text)
1425{
1426 GtkLabel *value_field;
1427
1428 if (ellipsize_text) {
1429 value_field = attach_ellipsizing_value_label (grid, sibling, "");
1430 } else {
1431 value_field = attach_value_label (grid, sibling, "");
1432 }
1433
1434 /* Stash a copy of the file attribute name in this field for the callback's sake. */
1435 g_object_set_data_full (G_OBJECT (value_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((value_field))))), "file_attribute",
1436 g_strdup (file_attribute_name)g_strdup_inline (file_attribute_name), g_free);
1437
1438 g_object_set_data_full (G_OBJECT (value_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((value_field))))), "inconsistent_string",
1439 g_strdup (inconsistent_string)g_strdup_inline (inconsistent_string), g_free);
1440
1441 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (value_field)((((GObject*) (void *) ((value_field))))), "show_original", GINT_TO_POINTER (show_original)((gpointer) (glong) (show_original)));
1442
1443 window->details->value_fields = g_list_prepend (window->details->value_fields,
1444 value_field);
1445 return GTK_WIDGET(value_field)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((value_field)))));
1446}
1447
1448static GtkWidget*
1449attach_value_field (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1450 GtkGrid *grid,
1451 GtkWidget *sibling,
1452 const char *file_attribute_name,
1453 const char *inconsistent_string,
1454 gboolean show_original)
1455{
1456 return attach_value_field_internal (window,
1457 grid, sibling,
1458 file_attribute_name,
1459 inconsistent_string,
1460 show_original,
1461 FALSE(0));
1462}
1463
1464static GtkWidget*
1465attach_ellipsizing_value_field (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1466 GtkGrid *grid,
1467 GtkWidget *sibling,
1468 const char *file_attribute_name,
1469 const char *inconsistent_string,
1470 gboolean show_original)
1471{
1472 return attach_value_field_internal (window,
1473 grid, sibling,
1474 file_attribute_name,
1475 inconsistent_string,
1476 show_original,
1477 TRUE(!(0)));
1478}
1479
1480static void
1481group_change_callback (CajaFile *file,
1482 GFile *res_loc,
1483 GError *error,
1484 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1485{
1486 char *group;
1487
1488 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_295
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_295 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_295 = 0; _g_boolean_var_295
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1488, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
1489 g_assert (window->details->group_change_file == file)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_296
; if (window->details->group_change_file == file) _g_boolean_var_296
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_296 = 0; _g_boolean_var_296; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1489, ((const char*) (__func__)), "window->details->group_change_file == file"
); } while (0);
1490
1491 group = window->details->group_change_group;
1492 g_assert (group != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_297
; if (group != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_297 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_297
= 0; _g_boolean_var_297; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1492, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "group != NULL"); } while (0);
1493
1494 /* Report the error if it's an error. */
1495 eel_timed_wait_stop ((EelCancelCallback) cancel_group_change_callback, window);
1496 fm_report_error_setting_group (file, error, GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))));
1497
1498 caja_file_unref (file);
1499 g_free (group);
1500
1501 window->details->group_change_file = NULL((void*)0);
1502 window->details->group_change_group = NULL((void*)0);
1503 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))));
1504}
1505
1506static void
1507cancel_group_change_callback (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1508{
1509 CajaFile *file;
1510 char *group;
1511
1512 file = window->details->group_change_file;
1513 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_298
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_298
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_298 = 0; _g_boolean_var_298; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1513, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }
while (0);
1514
1515 group = window->details->group_change_group;
1516 g_assert (group != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_299
; if (group != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_299 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_299
= 0; _g_boolean_var_299; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1516, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "group != NULL"); } while (0);
1517
1518 caja_file_cancel (file, (CajaFileOperationCallback) group_change_callback, window);
1519
1520 g_free (group);
1521 caja_file_unref (file);
1522
1523 window->details->group_change_file = NULL((void*)0);
1524 window->details->group_change_group = NULL((void*)0);
1525 g_object_unref (window);
1526}
1527
1528static gboolean
1529schedule_group_change_timeout (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1530{
1531 CajaFile *file;
1532 char *group;
1533
1534 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_300
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_300 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_300 = 0; _g_boolean_var_300
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1534, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
1535
1536 file = window->details->group_change_file;
1537 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_301
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_301
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_301 = 0; _g_boolean_var_301; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1537, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }

1540 g_assert (group != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_302
; if (group != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_302 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_302
= 0; _g_boolean_var_302; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1540, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "group != NULL"); } while (0);
1541
1542 eel_timed_wait_start
1543 ((EelCancelCallback) cancel_group_change_callback,
1544 window,
1545 _("Cancel Group Change?")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Cancel Group Change?", 5),
1546 GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))));
1547
1548 caja_file_set_group
1549 (file, group,
1550 (CajaFileOperationCallback) group_change_callback, window);
1551
1552 window->details->group_change_timeout = 0;
1553 return FALSE(0);
1554}
1555
1556static void
1557schedule_group_change (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
1558 CajaFile *file,
1559 const char *group)
1560{
1561 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_303
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_303 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_303 = 0; _g_boolean_var_303
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1561, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
1562 g_assert (window->details->group_change_group == NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_304
; if (window->details->group_change_group == ((void*)0)
) _g_boolean_var_304 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_304 = 0; _g_boolean_var_304
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1562, ((const char*) (__func__)), "window->details->group_change_group == NULL"
); } while (0);
1563 g_assert (window->details->group_change_file == NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_305
; if (window->details->group_change_file == ((void*)0))
_g_boolean_var_305 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_305 = 0; _g_boolean_var_305
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1563, ((const char*) (__func__)), "window->details->group_change_file == NULL"
); } while (0);
1564 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_306
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_306
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_306 = 0; _g_boolean_var_306; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1564, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }
while (0);
1565
1566 window->details->group_change_file = caja_file_ref (file);
1567 window->details->group_change_group = g_strdup (group)g_strdup_inline (group);
1568 g_object_ref (G_OBJECT (window))((__typeof__ (((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))))) (g_object_ref
) (((((GObject*) (void *) ((window)))))));
1569 window->details->group_change_timeout =
1570 g_timeout_add (CHOWN_CHGRP_TIMEOUT300,
1571 (GSourceFunc) schedule_group_change_timeout,
1572 window);
1573}
1574
1575static void
1576unschedule_or_cancel_group_change (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1577{
1578 CajaFile *file;
1579 char *group;
1580
1581 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_307
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_307 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_307 = 0; _g_boolean_var_307
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1581, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
1582
1583 file = window->details->group_change_file;
1584 group = window->details->group_change_group;
1585
1586 g_assert ((file == NULL && group == NULL) ||do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_308
; if ((file == ((void*)0) && group == ((void*)0)) || (
file != ((void*)0) && group != ((void*)0))) _g_boolean_var_308
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_308 = 0; _g_boolean_var_308; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1587, ((const char*) (__func__)), "(file == NULL && group == NULL) || (file != NULL && group != NULL)"
); } while (0)
1587 (file != NULL && group != NULL))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_308
; if ((file == ((void*)0) && group == ((void*)0)) || (
file != ((void*)0) && group != ((void*)0))) _g_boolean_var_308
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_308 = 0; _g_boolean_var_308; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1587, ((const char*) (__func__)), "(file == NULL && group == NULL) || (file != NULL && group != NULL)"
); } while (0);
1588
1589 if (file != NULL((void*)0)) {
1590 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_309
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_309
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_309 = 0; _g_boolean_var_309; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1590, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }
while (0);
1591
1592 if (window->details->group_change_timeout == 0) {
1593 caja_file_cancel (file,
1594 (CajaFileOperationCallback) group_change_callback, window);
1595 eel_timed_wait_stop ((EelCancelCallback) cancel_group_change_callback, window);
1596 }
1597
1598 caja_file_unref (file);
1599 g_free (group);
1600
1601 window->details->group_change_file = NULL((void*)0);
1602 window->details->group_change_group = NULL((void*)0);
1603 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))));
1604 }
1605
1606 if (window->details->group_change_timeout > 0) {
1607 g_assert (file != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_310
; if (file != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_310 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_310
= 0; _g_boolean_var_310; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1607, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "file != NULL"); } while (0);
1608 g_source_remove (window->details->group_change_timeout);
1609 window->details->group_change_timeout = 0;
1610 }
1611}
1612
1613static void
1614changed_group_callback (GtkComboBox *combo_box, CajaFile *file)
1615{
1616 char *group;
1617 char *cur_group;
1618
1619 g_assert (GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_311
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((combo_box)); GType __t = ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_311
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_311 = 0; _g_boolean_var_311; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1619, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)"
); } while (0);
1620 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_312
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_312
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_312 = 0; _g_boolean_var_312; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1620, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }
while (0);
1621
1622 group = gtk_combo_box_text_get_active_text (GTK_COMBO_BOX_TEXT (combo_box)((((GtkComboBoxText*) (void *) ((combo_box))))));
1623 cur_group = caja_file_get_group_name (file);
1624
1625 if (group != NULL((void*)0) && strcmp (group, cur_group) != 0) {
1626 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
1627
1628 /* Try to change file group. If this fails, complain to user. */
1629 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (gtk_widget_get_ancestor (GTK_WIDGET (combo_box), GTK_TYPE_WINDOW))((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_get_ancestor (
((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), (gtk_window_get_type
())))))));
1630
1631 unschedule_or_cancel_group_change (window);
1632 schedule_group_change (window, file, group);
1633 }
1634 g_free (group);
1635 g_free (cur_group);
1636}
1637
1638/* checks whether the given column at the first level
1639 * of model has the specified entries in the given order. */
1640static gboolean
1641tree_model_entries_equal (GtkTreeModel *model,
1642 unsigned int column,
1643 GList *entries)
1644{
1645 GtkTreeIter iter;
1646 gboolean empty_model;
1647
1648 g_assert (GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_313
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((model)); GType __t = ((gtk_tree_model_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_313
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_313 = 0; _g_boolean_var_313; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1648, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model)"
); } while (0);
1649 g_assert (gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == G_TYPE_STRING)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_314
; if (gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == ((GType
) ((16) << (2)))) _g_boolean_var_314 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_314
= 0; _g_boolean_var_314; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1649, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == G_TYPE_STRING"
); } while (0);
1650
1651 empty_model = !gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (model, &iter);
1652
1653 if (!empty_model && entries != NULL((void*)0)) {
1654 GList *l;
1655
1656 l = entries;
1657
1658 do {
1659 char *val;
1660
1661 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter,
1662 column, &val,
1663 -1);
1664 if ((val == NULL((void*)0) && l->data != NULL((void*)0)) ||
1665 (val != NULL((void*)0) && l->data == NULL((void*)0)) ||
1666 (val != NULL((void*)0) && strcmp (val, l->data))) {
1667 g_free (val);
1668 return FALSE(0);
1669 }
1670
1671 g_free (val);
1672 l = l->next;
1673 } while (gtk_tree_model_iter_next (model, &iter));
1674
1675 return l == NULL((void*)0);
1676 } else {
1677 return (empty_model && entries == NULL((void*)0)) ||
1678 (!empty_model && entries != NULL((void*)0));
1679 }
1680}
1681
1682static char *
1683combo_box_get_active_entry (GtkComboBox *combo_box,
1684 unsigned int column)
1685{
1686 GtkTreeIter iter;
1687 char *val;
1688
1689 g_assert (GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_315
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((combo_box)); GType __t = ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_315
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_315 = 0; _g_boolean_var_315; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1689, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)"
); } while (0);
1690
1691 if (gtk_combo_box_get_active_iter (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), &iter)) {
1692 GtkTreeModel *model;
1693
1694 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (combo_box);
1695 g_assert (GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_316
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((model)); GType __t = ((gtk_tree_model_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_316
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_316 = 0; _g_boolean_var_316; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1695, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model)"
); } while (0);
1696
1697 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter,
1698 column, &val,
1699 -1);
1700 return val;
1701 }
1702
1703 return NULL((void*)0);
1704}
1705
1706/* returns the index of the given entry in the the given column
1707 * at the first level of model. Returns -1 if entry can't be found
1708 * or entry is NULL.
1709 * */
1710static int
1711tree_model_get_entry_index (GtkTreeModel *model,
1712 unsigned int column,
1713 const char *entry)
1714{
1715 GtkTreeIter iter;
1716 gboolean empty_model;
1717
1718 g_assert (GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_317
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((model)); GType __t = ((gtk_tree_model_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_317
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_317 = 0; _g_boolean_var_317; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1718, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_TREE_MODEL (model)"
); } while (0);
1719 g_assert (gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == G_TYPE_STRING)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_318
; if (gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == ((GType
) ((16) << (2)))) _g_boolean_var_318 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_318
= 0; _g_boolean_var_318; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 1719, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "gtk_tree_model_get_column_type (model, column) == G_TYPE_STRING"
); } while (0);
1720
1721 empty_model = !gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (model, &iter);
1722 if (!empty_model && entry != NULL((void*)0)) {
1723 int index;
1724
1725 index = 0;
1726
1727 do {
1728 char *val;
1729
1730 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter,
1731 column, &val,
1732 -1);
1733 if (val != NULL((void*)0) && !strcmp (val, entry)) {
1734 g_free (val);
1735 return index;
1736 }
1737
1738 g_free (val);
1739 index++;
1740 } while (gtk_tree_model_iter_next (model, &iter));
1741 }
1742
1743 return -1;
1744}
1745
1746static void
1747synch_groups_combo_box (GtkComboBox *combo_box, CajaFile *file)
1748{
1749 GList *groups;
1750 GList *node;
1751 GtkTreeModel *model;
1752 GtkListStore *store;
1753 char *current_group_name;
1754 int current_group_index;
1755
1756 g_assert (GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_319
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((combo_box)); GType __t = ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_319
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_319 = 0; _g_boolean_var_319; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1756, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)"
); } while (0);
1757 g_assert (CAJA_IS_FILE (file))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_320
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((file)); GType __t = (caja_file_get_type()); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_320
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_320 = 0; _g_boolean_var_320; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1757, ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_FILE (file)"); }
while (0);
1758
1759 if (caja_file_is_gone (file)) {
1760 return;
1761 }
1762
1763 groups = caja_file_get_settable_group_names (file);
1764
1765 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (combo_box);
1766 store = GTK_LIST_STORE (model)((((GtkListStore*) (void *) ((model)))));
1767 g_assert (GTK_IS_LIST_STORE (model))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_321
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((model)); GType __t = ((gtk_list_store_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_321
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_321 = 0; _g_boolean_var_321; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 1767, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_LIST_STORE (model)"
); } while (0);
1768
1769 if (!tree_model_entries_equal (model, 0, groups)) {
1770 int group_index;
1771
1772 /* Clear the contents of ComboBox in a wacky way because there
1773 * is no function to clear all items and also no function to obtain
1774 * the number of items in a combobox.
1775 */
1776 gtk_list_store_clear (store);
1777
1778 for (node = groups, group_index = 0; node != NULL((void*)0); node = node->next, ++group_index) {
1779 const char *group_name;
1780
1781 group_name = (const char *)node->data;
1782 gtk_combo_box_text_append_text (GTK_COMBO_BOX_TEXT (combo_box)((((GtkComboBoxText*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), group_name);
1783 }
1784 }
1785
1786 current_group_name = caja_file_get_group_name (file);
1787 current_group_index = tree_model_get_entry_index (model, 0, current_group_name);
1788
1789 /* If current group wasn't in list, we prepend it (with a separator).
1790 * This can happen if the current group is an id with no matching
1791 * group in the groups file.
1792 */
1793 if (current_group_index < 0 && current_group_name != NULL((void*)0)) {
1794 if (groups != NULL((void*)0)) {
1795 /* add separator */
1796 gtk_combo_box_text_prepend_text (GTK_COMBO_BOX_TEXT (combo_box)((((GtkComboBoxText*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), "-");
1797 }
1798
1799 gtk_combo_box_text_prepend_text (GTK_COMBO_BOX_TEXT (combo_box)((((GtkComboBoxText*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), current_group_name);
1800 current_group_index = 0;
1801 }
1802 gtk_combo_box_set_active (combo_box, current_group_index);
1803
1804 g_free (current_group_name);
1805 g_list_free_full (groups, g_free);
1806}
1807
1808static gboolean
1809combo_box_row_separator_func (GtkTreeModel *model,
1810 GtkTreeIter *iter,
1811 gpointer data)
1812{
1813 gchar *text;
1814 gboolean ret;
1815
1816 gtk_tree_model_get (model, iter, 0, &text, -1);
1817
1818 if (text == NULL((void*)0)) {
1819 return FALSE(0);
1820 }
1821
1822 if (strcmp (text, "-") == 0) {
1823 ret = TRUE(!(0));
1824 } else {
1825 ret = FALSE(0);
1826 }
1827
1828 g_free (text);
1829 return ret;
1830}
1831
1832static GtkComboBox *
1833attach_combo_box (GtkGrid *grid,
1834 GtkWidget *sibling,
1835 gboolean two_columns)
1836{
1837 GtkWidget *combo_box;
1838
1839 if (!two_columns) {
1840 combo_box = gtk_combo_box_text_new ();
1841 } else {
1842 GtkTreeModel *model;
1843 GtkCellRenderer *renderer;
1844
1845 model = GTK_TREE_MODEL (gtk_list_store_new (2, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING))((((GtkTreeModel*) (void *) ((gtk_list_store_new (2, ((GType)
((16) << (2))), ((GType) ((16) << (2)))))))));
1846 combo_box = gtk_combo_box_new_with_model (model);
1847 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (model)((((GObject*) (void *) ((model))))));
1848
1849 renderer = gtk_cell_renderer_text_new ();
1850 gtk_cell_layout_pack_start (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (combo_box)((((GtkCellLayout*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), renderer, TRUE(!(0)));
1851 gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (combo_box)((((GtkCellLayout*) (void *) ((combo_box))))), renderer,
1852 "text", 0);
1853
1854 }
1855
1856 gtk_widget_set_halign (combo_box, GTK_ALIGN_START);
1857
1858 gtk_widget_show (combo_box);
1859
1860 gtk_combo_box_set_row_separator_func (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo_box))))),
1861 combo_box_row_separator_func,
1862 NULL((void*)0),
1863 NULL((void*)0));
1864
1865 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (grid, combo_box, sibling,
1866 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 1);
1867
1868 return GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo_box)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo_box)))));
1869}
1870
1871static GtkComboBox*
1872attach_group_combo_box (GtkGrid *grid,
1873 GtkWidget *sibling,
1874 CajaFile *file)
1875{
1876 GtkComboBox *combo_box;
1877
1878 combo_box = attach_combo_box (grid, sibling, FALSE(0));
1879
1880 synch_groups_combo_box (combo_box, file);
1881
1882 /* Connect to signal to update menu when file changes. */
1883 g_signal_connect_object (file, "changed",
1884 G_CALLBACK (synch_groups_combo_box)((GCallback) (synch_groups_combo_box)),
1885 combo_box, G_CONNECT_SWAPPED);
1886 g_signal_connect_data (combo_box, "changed",
1887 G_CALLBACK (changed_group_callback)((GCallback) (changed_group_callback)),
1888 caja_file_ref (file),
1889 (GClosureNotify)caja_file_unref, 0);
1890
1891 return combo_box;
1892}
1893
1894static void
1895owner_change_callback (CajaFile *file,
1896 GFile *result_location,
1897 GError *error,
1898 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
1899{
1900 char *owner;
1901
