3878 GtkLabel *label_for,
3879 gboolean is_folder)
3880{
3881 const gchar *label;
3882
3883 if (type == PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_READ) {
3884 label = _("_Read")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Read", 5);
3885 } else if (type == PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_WRITE) {
3886 label = _("_Write")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Write", 5);
3887 } else {
3888 label = _("E_xecute")dcgettext (((void*)0), "E_xecute", 5);
3889 }
3890
3891 return add_permissions_checkbox_with_label (window, grid,
3892 sibling,
3893 label,
3894 permission_to_check,
3895 label_for,
3896 is_folder);
3897}
3898
3899enum {
3900 UNIX_PERM_SUID = S_ISUID04000,
3901 UNIX_PERM_SGID = S_ISGID02000,
3902 UNIX_PERM_STICKY = 01000, /* S_ISVTX not defined on all systems */
3903 UNIX_PERM_USER_READ = S_IRUSR0400,
3904 UNIX_PERM_USER_WRITE = S_IWUSR0200,
3905 UNIX_PERM_USER_EXEC = S_IXUSR0100,
3906 UNIX_PERM_USER_ALL = S_IRUSR0400 | S_IWUSR0200 | S_IXUSR0100,
3907 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_READ = S_IRGRP(0400 >> 3),
3908 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_WRITE = S_IWGRP(0200 >> 3),
3909 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_EXEC = S_IXGRP(0100 >> 3),
3910 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_ALL = S_IRGRP(0400 >> 3) | S_IWGRP(0200 >> 3) | S_IXGRP(0100 >> 3),
3911 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_READ = S_IROTH((0400 >> 3) >> 3),
3912 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_WRITE = S_IWOTH((0200 >> 3) >> 3),
3913 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_EXEC = S_IXOTH((0100 >> 3) >> 3),
3914 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_ALL = S_IROTH((0400 >> 3) >> 3) | S_IWOTH((0200 >> 3) >> 3) | S_IXOTH((0100 >> 3) >> 3)
3915};
3916
3917typedef enum {
3918 PERMISSION_READ = (1<<0),
3919 PERMISSION_WRITE = (1<<1),
3920 PERMISSION_EXEC = (1<<2)
3921} PermissionValue;
3922
3923typedef enum {
3924 PERMISSION_USER,
3925 PERMISSION_GROUP,
3926 PERMISSION_OTHER
3927} PermissionType;
3928
3929static guint32 vfs_perms[3][3] = {
3930 {UNIX_PERM_USER_READ, UNIX_PERM_USER_WRITE, UNIX_PERM_USER_EXEC},
3931 {UNIX_PERM_GROUP_READ, UNIX_PERM_GROUP_WRITE, UNIX_PERM_GROUP_EXEC},
3932 {UNIX_PERM_OTHER_READ, UNIX_PERM_OTHER_WRITE, UNIX_PERM_OTHER_EXEC},
3933};
3934
3935static guint32
3936permission_to_vfs (PermissionType type, PermissionValue perm)
3937{
3938 guint32 vfs_perm;
3939 g_assert (type >= 0 && type < 3)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_351
; if (type >= 0 && type < 3) _g_boolean_var_351
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_351 = 0; _g_boolean_var_351; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 3939, ((const char*) (__func__)), "type >= 0 && type < 3"
); } while (0);
3940
3941 vfs_perm = 0;
3942 if (perm & PERMISSION_READ) {
3943 vfs_perm |= vfs_perms[type][0];
3944 }
3945 if (perm & PERMISSION_WRITE) {
3946 vfs_perm |= vfs_perms[type][1];
3947 }
3948 if (perm & PERMISSION_EXEC) {
3949 vfs_perm |= vfs_perms[type][2];
3950 }
3951
3952 return vfs_perm;
3953}
3954
3955static PermissionValue
3956permission_from_vfs (PermissionType type, guint32 vfs_perm)
3957{
3958 PermissionValue perm;
3959 g_assert (type >= 0 && type < 3)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_352
; if (type >= 0 && type < 3) _g_boolean_var_352
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_352 = 0; _g_boolean_var_352; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 3959, ((const char*) (__func__)), "type >= 0 && type < 3"
); } while (0);
3960
3961 perm = 0;
3962 if (vfs_perm & vfs_perms[type][0]) {
3963 perm |= PERMISSION_READ;
3964 }
3965 if (vfs_perm & vfs_perms[type][1]) {
3966 perm |= PERMISSION_WRITE;
3967 }
3968 if (vfs_perm & vfs_perms[type][2]) {
3969 perm |= PERMISSION_EXEC;
3970 }
3971
3972 return perm;
3973}
3974
3975static void
3976permission_combo_changed (GtkWidget *combo, FMPropertiesWindow *window)
3977{
3978 GtkTreeIter iter;
3979 GtkTreeModel *model;
3980 gboolean is_folder, use_original;
3981 PermissionType type;
3982 int new_perm, mask;
3983 guint32 vfs_new_perm, vfs_mask;
3984
3985 is_folder = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo), "is-folder"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "is-folder")));
3986 type = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo), "permission-type"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "permission-type")));
3987
3988 if (is_folder) {
3989 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE|PERMISSION_EXEC;
3990 } else {
3991 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE;
3992 }
3993
3994 vfs_mask = permission_to_vfs (type, mask);
3995
3996 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))));
3997
3998 if (!gtk_combo_box_get_active_iter (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))), &iter)) {
3999 return;
4000 }
4001 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter, 1, &new_perm, 2, &use_original, -1);
4002 vfs_new_perm = permission_to_vfs (type, new_perm);
4003
4004 update_permissions (window, vfs_new_perm, vfs_mask,
4005 is_folder, FALSE(0), use_original);
4006}
4007
4008static void
4009permission_combo_add_multiple_choice (GtkComboBox *combo, GtkTreeIter *iter)
4010{
4011 GtkTreeModel *model;
4012 GtkListStore *store;
4013 gboolean found;
4014
4015 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (combo);
4016 store = GTK_LIST_STORE (model)((((GtkListStore*) (void *) ((model)))));
4017
4018 found = FALSE(0);
4019 gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (model, iter);
4020 do {
4021 gboolean multi;
4022 gtk_tree_model_get (model, iter, 2, &multi, -1);
4023
4024 if (multi) {
4025 found = TRUE(!(0));
4026 break;
4027 }
4028 } while (gtk_tree_model_iter_next (model, iter));
4029
4030 if (!found) {
4031 gtk_list_store_append (store, iter);
4032 gtk_list_store_set (store, iter, 0, "---", 1, 0, 2, TRUE(!(0)), -1);
4033 }
4034}
4035
4036static void
4037permission_combo_update (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
4038 GtkComboBox *combo)
4039{
4040 PermissionType type;
4041 PermissionValue perm, all_dir_perm, all_file_perm, all_perm;
4042 gboolean is_folder, no_files, no_dirs, all_file_same, all_dir_same, all_same;
4043 gboolean all_dir_cannot_set, all_file_cannot_set, sensitive;
4044 GtkTreeIter iter;
4045 int mask;
4046 GtkTreeModel *model;
4047 GtkListStore *store;
4048 GList *l;
4049 gboolean is_multi;
4050
4051 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (combo);
4052
4053 is_folder = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo), "is-folder"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "is-folder")));
4054 type = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo), "permission-type"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "permission-type")));
4055
4056 is_multi = FALSE(0);
4057 if (gtk_combo_box_get_active_iter (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))), &iter)) {
4058 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter, 2, &is_multi, -1);
4059 }
4060
4061 if (is_multi && window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4062 /* Never change from an inconsistent state if we have dirs, even
4063 * if the current state is now consistent, because its a useful
4064 * state for recursive apply.
4065 */
4066 return;
4067 }
4068
4069 no_files = TRUE(!(0));
4070 no_dirs = TRUE(!(0));
4071 all_dir_same = TRUE(!(0));
4072 all_file_same = TRUE(!(0));
4073 all_dir_perm = 0;
4074 all_file_perm = 0;
4075 all_dir_cannot_set = TRUE(!(0));
4076 all_file_cannot_set = TRUE(!(0));
4077
4078 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4079 CajaFile *file;
4080 guint32 file_permissions;
4081
4082 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4083
4084 if (!caja_file_can_get_permissions (file)) {
4085 continue;
4086 }
4087
4088 if (caja_file_is_directory (file)) {
4089 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE|PERMISSION_EXEC;
4090 } else {
4091 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE;
4092 }
4093
4094 file_permissions = caja_file_get_permissions (file);
4095
4096 perm = permission_from_vfs (type, file_permissions) & mask;
4097
4098 if (caja_file_is_directory (file)) {
4099 if (no_dirs) {
4100 all_dir_perm = perm;
4101 no_dirs = FALSE(0);
4102 } else if (perm != all_dir_perm) {
4103 all_dir_same = FALSE(0);
4104 }
4105
4106 if (caja_file_can_set_permissions (file)) {
4107 all_dir_cannot_set = FALSE(0);
4108 }
4109 } else {
4110 if (no_files) {
4111 all_file_perm = perm;
4112 no_files = FALSE(0);
4113 } else if (perm != all_file_perm) {
4114 all_file_same = FALSE(0);
4115 }
4116
4117 if (caja_file_can_set_permissions (file)) {
4118 all_file_cannot_set = FALSE(0);
4119 }
4120 }
4121 }
4122
4123 if (is_folder) {
4124 all_same = all_dir_same;
4125 all_perm = all_dir_perm;
4126 } else {
4127 all_same = all_file_same && !no_files;
4128 all_perm = all_file_perm;
4129 }
4130
4131 store = GTK_LIST_STORE (model)((((GtkListStore*) (void *) ((model)))));
4132 if (all_same) {
4133 gboolean found;
4134
4135 found = FALSE(0);
4136 gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (model, &iter);
4137 do {
4138 int current_perm;
4139 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter, 1, &current_perm, -1);
4140
4141 if (((PermissionValue) current_perm) == all_perm) {
4142 found = TRUE(!(0));
4143 break;
4144 }
4145 } while (gtk_tree_model_iter_next (model, &iter));
4146
4147 if (!found) {
4148 GString *str;
4149 str = g_string_new ("");
4150
4151 if (!(all_perm & PERMISSION_READ)) {
4152 /* Translators: this gets concatenated to "no read",
4153 * "no access", etc. (see following strings)
4154 */
4155 g_string_append (str, _("no "))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ",
5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_353; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_353 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_353 = 0; _g_boolean_var_353
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "no ", 5), (gssize) -1));
4156 }
4157 if (is_folder) {
4158 g_string_append (str, _("list"))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "list", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "list"
, 5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_354; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_354 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_354 = 0; _g_boolean_var_354
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "list", 5), (gssize) -1));
4159 } else {
4160 g_string_append (str, _("read"))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "read", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "read"
, 5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_355; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_355 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_355 = 0; _g_boolean_var_355
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "read", 5), (gssize) -1));
4161 }
4162
4163 g_string_append (str, ", ")(__builtin_constant_p (", ") ? __extension__ ({ const char * const
__val = (", "); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_356; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_356 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_356 = 0; _g_boolean_var_356
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, ", ", (gssize) -1
));
4164
4165 if (!(all_perm & PERMISSION_WRITE)) {
4166 g_string_append (str, _("no "))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ",
5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_357; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_357 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_357 = 0; _g_boolean_var_357
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "no ", 5), (gssize) -1));
4167 }
4168 if (is_folder) {
4169 g_string_append (str, _("create/delete"))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "create/delete"
, 5)) ? __extension__ ({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext
(((void*)0), "create/delete", 5)); g_string_append_len_inline
(str, __val, (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_358
; if (__val != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_358 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_358
= 0; _g_boolean_var_358; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val)
+ !(__val))) : (gssize) -1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline
(str, dcgettext (((void*)0), "create/delete", 5), (gssize) -
1));
4170 } else {
4171 g_string_append (str, _("write"))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "write", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "write"
, 5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_359; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_359 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_359 = 0; _g_boolean_var_359
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "write", 5), (gssize) -1));
4172 }
4173
4174 if (is_folder) {
4175 g_string_append (str, ", ")(__builtin_constant_p (", ") ? __extension__ ({ const char * const
__val = (", "); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_360; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_360 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_360 = 0; _g_boolean_var_360
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, ", ", (gssize) -1
));
4176
4177 if (!(all_perm & PERMISSION_EXEC)) {
4178 g_string_append (str, _("no "))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ", 5)) ? __extension__
({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void*)0), "no ",
5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_361; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_361 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_361 = 0; _g_boolean_var_361
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (str, dcgettext (((void
*)0), "no ", 5), (gssize) -1));
4179 }
4180 g_string_append (str, _("access"))(__builtin_constant_p (dcgettext (((void*)0), "access", 5)) ?
__extension__ ({ const char * const __val = (dcgettext (((void
*)0), "access", 5)); g_string_append_len_inline (str, __val, (
__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_362; if
(__val != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_362 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_362
= 0; _g_boolean_var_362; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val)
+ !(__val))) : (gssize) -1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline
(str, dcgettext (((void*)0), "access", 5), (gssize) -1));
4181 }
4182
4183 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4184 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter,
4185 0, str->str,
4186 1, all_perm, -1);
4187
4188 g_string_free (str, TRUE)(__builtin_constant_p ((!(0))) ? (((!(0))) ? (g_string_free) (
(str), ((!(0)))) : g_string_free_and_steal (str)) : (g_string_free
) ((str), ((!(0)))));
4189 }
4190 } else {
4191 permission_combo_add_multiple_choice (combo, &iter);
4192 }
4193
4194 g_signal_handlers_block_by_func (G_OBJECT (combo),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((combo
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window))
4195 G_CALLBACK (permission_combo_changed),g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((combo
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window))
4196 window)g_signal_handlers_block_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((combo
)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window));
4197
4198 gtk_combo_box_set_active_iter (combo, &iter);
4199
4200 /* Also enable if no files found (for recursive
4201 file changes when only selecting folders) */
4202 if (is_folder) {
4203 sensitive = !all_dir_cannot_set;
4204 } else {
4205 sensitive = !all_file_cannot_set ||
4206 window->details->has_recursive_apply;
4207 }
4208 gtk_widget_set_sensitive (GTK_WIDGET (combo)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((combo))))), sensitive);
4209
4210 g_signal_handlers_unblock_by_func (G_OBJECT (combo),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window))
4211 G_CALLBACK (permission_combo_changed),g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window))
4212 window)g_signal_handlers_unblock_matched ((((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo)))))), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed)
)), (window));
4213
4214}
4215
4216static void
4217add_permissions_combo_box (FMPropertiesWindow *window, GtkGrid *grid,
4218 PermissionType type, gboolean is_folder,
4219 gboolean short_label)
4220{
4221 GtkWidget *combo;
4222 GtkLabel *label;
4223 GtkListStore *store;
4224 GtkCellRenderer *cell;
4225 GtkTreeIter iter;
4226
4227 if (short_label) {
4228 label = attach_title_field (grid, _("Access:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Access:", 5));
4229 } else if (is_folder) {
4230 label = attach_title_field (grid, _("Folder access:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Folder access:", 5));
4231 } else {
4232 label = attach_title_field (grid, _("File access:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "File access:", 5));
4233 }
4234
4235 store = gtk_list_store_new (3, G_TYPE_STRING((GType) ((16) << (2))), G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))));
4236 combo = gtk_combo_box_new_with_model (GTK_TREE_MODEL (store)((((GtkTreeModel*) (void *) ((store))))));
4237
4238 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (combo)((((GObject*) (void *) ((combo))))), "is-folder", GINT_TO_POINTER (is_folder)((gpointer) (glong) (is_folder)));
4239 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (combo)((((GObject*) (void *) ((combo))))), "permission-type", GINT_TO_POINTER (type)((gpointer) (glong) (type)));
4240
4241 if (is_folder) {
4242 if (type != PERMISSION_USER) {
4243 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4244 /* Translators: this is referred to the permissions
4245 * the user has in a directory.
4246 */
4247 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("None")dcgettext (((void*)0), "None", 5), 1, 0, -1);
4248 }
4249 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4250 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("List files only")dcgettext (((void*)0), "List files only", 5), 1, PERMISSION_READ, -1);
4251 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4252 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("Access files")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Access files", 5), 1, PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_EXEC, -1);
4253 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4254 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("Create and delete files")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Create and delete files", 5), 1, PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_EXEC|PERMISSION_WRITE, -1);
4255 } else {
4256 if (type != PERMISSION_USER) {
4257 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4258 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("None")dcgettext (((void*)0), "None", 5), 1, 0, -1);
4259 }
4260 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4261 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("Read-only")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Read-only", 5), 1, PERMISSION_READ, -1);
4262 gtk_list_store_append (store, &iter);
4263 gtk_list_store_set (store, &iter, 0, _("Read and write")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Read and write", 5), 1, PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE, -1);
4264 }
4265 if (window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4266 permission_combo_add_multiple_choice (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))), &iter);
4267 }
4268
4269 g_object_unref (store);
4270
4271 window->details->permission_combos =
4272 g_list_prepend (window->details->permission_combos,
4273 combo);
4274
4275 g_signal_connect (combo, "changed", G_CALLBACK (permission_combo_changed), window)g_signal_connect_data ((combo), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (permission_combo_changed
))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
4276
4277 cell = gtk_cell_renderer_text_new ();
4278 gtk_cell_layout_pack_start (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (combo)((((GtkCellLayout*) (void *) ((combo))))), cell, TRUE(!(0)));
4279 gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (combo)((((GtkCellLayout*) (void *) ((combo))))), cell,
4280 "text", 0,
4281 NULL((void*)0));
4282
4283 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (label, combo);
4284 gtk_widget_show (combo);
4285
4286 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (grid, combo, GTK_WIDGET (label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((label))))),
4287 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 1);
4288}
4289
4290static GtkWidget *
4291append_special_execution_checkbox (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
4292 GtkGrid *grid,
4293 GtkWidget *sibling,
4294 const char *label_text,
4295 guint32 permission_to_check)
4296{
4297 GtkWidget *check_button;
4298
4299 check_button = gtk_check_button_new_with_mnemonic (label_text);
4300 gtk_widget_show (check_button);
4301
4302 if (sibling != NULL((void*)0)) {
4303 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (grid, check_button, sibling,
4304 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 1);
4305 } else {
4306 gtk_container_add_with_properties (GTK_CONTAINER (grid)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((grid))))), check_button,
4307 "left-attach", 1,
4308 NULL((void*)0));
4309 }
4310
4311 set_up_permissions_checkbox (window,
4312 check_button,
4313 permission_to_check,
4314 FALSE(0));
4315 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (check_button)((((GObject*) (void *) ((check_button))))), "is-special",
4316 GINT_TO_POINTER (TRUE)((gpointer) (glong) ((!(0)))));
4317
4318 return check_button;
4319}
4320
4321static void
4322append_special_execution_flags (FMPropertiesWindow *window, GtkGrid *grid)
4323{
4324 GtkWidget *title;
4325
4326 append_blank_slim_row (grid);
4327 title = GTK_WIDGET (attach_title_field (grid, _("Special flags:")))((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((attach_title_field (grid, dcgettext
(((void*)0), "Special flags:", 5)))))));
4328
4329 append_special_execution_checkbox (window, grid, title, _("Set _user ID")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Set _user ID", 5), UNIX_PERM_SUID);
4330 append_special_execution_checkbox (window, grid, NULL((void*)0), _("Set gro_up ID")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Set gro_up ID", 5), UNIX_PERM_SGID);
4331 append_special_execution_checkbox (window, grid, NULL((void*)0), _("_Sticky")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Sticky", 5), UNIX_PERM_STICKY);
4332}
4333
4334static gboolean
4335all_can_get_permissions (GList *file_list)
4336{
4337 GList *l;
4338 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4339 CajaFile *file;
4340
4341 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4342
4343 if (!caja_file_can_get_permissions (file)) {
4344 return FALSE(0);
4345 }
4346 }
4347
4348 return TRUE(!(0));
4349}
4350
4351static gboolean
4352all_can_set_permissions (GList *file_list)
4353{
4354 GList *l;
4355 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4356 CajaFile *file;
4357
4358 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4359
4360 if (!caja_file_can_set_permissions (file)) {
4361 return FALSE(0);
4362 }
4363 }
4364
4365 return TRUE(!(0));
4366}
4367
4368static GHashTable *
4369get_initial_permissions (GList *file_list)
4370{
4371 GHashTable *ret;
4372 GList *l;
4373
4374 ret = g_hash_table_new (g_direct_hash,
4375 g_direct_equal);
4376
4377 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4378 guint32 permissions;
4379 CajaFile *file;
4380
4381 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4382
4383 permissions = caja_file_get_permissions (file);
4384 g_hash_table_insert (ret, file,
4385 GINT_TO_POINTER (permissions)((gpointer) (glong) (permissions)));
4386 }
4387
4388 return ret;
4389}
4390
4391static void
4392create_simple_permissions (FMPropertiesWindow *window, GtkGrid *page_grid)
4393{
4394 gboolean has_file, has_directory;
4395 GtkLabel *group_label;
4396 GtkLabel *owner_label;
4397 GtkLabel *execute_label;
4398 GtkWidget *value;
4399
4400 has_file = files_has_file (window);
4401 has_directory = files_has_directory (window);
4402
4403 if (!is_multi_file_window (window) && caja_file_can_set_owner (get_target_file (window))) {
4404 GtkComboBox *owner_combo_box;
4405
4406 owner_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("_Owner:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Owner:", 5));
4407 /* Combo box in this case. */
4408 owner_combo_box = attach_owner_combo_box (page_grid,
4409 GTK_WIDGET (owner_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_label))))),
4410 get_target_file (window));
4411 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (owner_label,
4412 GTK_WIDGET (owner_combo_box)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_combo_box))))));
4413 } else {
4414 owner_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Owner:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Owner:", 5));
4415 /* Static text in this case. */
4416 value = attach_value_field (window,
4417 page_grid, GTK_WIDGET (owner_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_label))))),
4418 "owner",
4419 INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4420 FALSE(0));
4421 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (owner_label, value);
4422 }
4423
4424 if (has_directory) {
4425 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4426 PERMISSION_USER, TRUE(!(0)), FALSE(0));
4427 }
4428 if (has_file || window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4429 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4430 PERMISSION_USER, FALSE(0), !has_directory);
4431 }
4432
4433 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4434
4435 if (!is_multi_file_window (window) && caja_file_can_set_group (get_target_file (window))) {
4436 GtkComboBox *group_combo_box;
4437
4438 group_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("_Group:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Group:", 5));
4439
4440 /* Combo box in this case. */
4441 group_combo_box = attach_group_combo_box (page_grid, GTK_WIDGET (group_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_label))))),
4442 get_target_file (window));
4443 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (group_label,
4444 GTK_WIDGET (group_combo_box)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_combo_box))))));
4445 } else {
4446 group_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Group:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Group:", 5));
4447
4448 /* Static text in this case. */
4449 value = attach_value_field (window, page_grid,
4450 GTK_WIDGET (group_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_label))))),
4451 "group",
4452 INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4453 FALSE(0));
4454 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (group_label, value);
4455 }
4456
4457 if (has_directory) {
4458 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4459 PERMISSION_GROUP, TRUE(!(0)),
4460 FALSE(0));
4461 }
4462 if (has_file || window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4463 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4464 PERMISSION_GROUP, FALSE(0),
4465 !has_directory);
4466 }
4467
4468 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4469
4470 group_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Others")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Others", 5));
4471
4472 if (has_directory) {
4473 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4474 PERMISSION_OTHER, TRUE(!(0)),
4475 FALSE(0));
4476 }
4477 if (has_file || window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4478 add_permissions_combo_box (window, page_grid,
4479 PERMISSION_OTHER, FALSE(0),
4480 !has_directory);
4481 }
4482
4483 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4484
4485 execute_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Execute:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Execute:", 5));
4486 add_permissions_checkbox_with_label (window, page_grid,
4487 GTK_WIDGET (execute_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((execute_label))))),
4488 _("Allow _executing file as program")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Allow _executing file as program", 5),
4489 UNIX_PERM_USER_EXEC|UNIX_PERM_GROUP_EXEC|UNIX_PERM_OTHER_EXEC,
4490 execute_label, FALSE(0));
4491}
4492
4493static void
4494create_permission_checkboxes (FMPropertiesWindow *window,
4495 GtkGrid *page_grid,
4496 gboolean is_folder)
4497{
4498 GtkLabel *owner_perm_label;
4499 GtkLabel *group_perm_label;
4500 GtkLabel *other_perm_label;
4501 GtkGrid *check_button_grid;
4502 GtkWidget *w;
4503
4504 owner_perm_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Owner:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Owner:", 5));
4505 group_perm_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Group:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Group:", 5));
4506 other_perm_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Others:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Others:", 5));
4507
4508 check_button_grid = GTK_GRID (create_grid_with_standard_properties ())((((GtkGrid*) (void *) ((create_grid_with_standard_properties
())))));
4509 gtk_widget_show (GTK_WIDGET (check_button_grid)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((check_button_grid))))));
4510
4511 gtk_grid_attach_next_to (page_grid, GTK_WIDGET (check_button_grid)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((check_button_grid))))),
4512 GTK_WIDGET (owner_perm_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_perm_label))))),
4513 GTK_POS_RIGHT, 1, 3);
4514
4515 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4516 check_button_grid,
4517 NULL((void*)0),
4518 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_READ,
4519 UNIX_PERM_USER_READ,
4520 owner_perm_label,
4521 is_folder);
4522
4523 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4524 check_button_grid,
4525 w,
4526 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_WRITE,
4527 UNIX_PERM_USER_WRITE,
4528 owner_perm_label,
4529 is_folder);
4530
4531 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
Value stored to 'w' is never read
4532 check_button_grid,
4533 w,
4534 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_EXECUTE,
4535 UNIX_PERM_USER_EXEC,
4536 owner_perm_label,
4537 is_folder);
4538
4539 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4540 check_button_grid,
4541 NULL((void*)0),
4542 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_READ,
4543 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_READ,
4544 group_perm_label,
4545 is_folder);
4546
4547 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4548 check_button_grid,
4549 w,
4550 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_WRITE,
4551 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_WRITE,
4552 group_perm_label,
4553 is_folder);
4554
4555 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4556 check_button_grid,
4557 w,
4558 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_EXECUTE,
4559 UNIX_PERM_GROUP_EXEC,
4560 group_perm_label,
4561 is_folder);
4562
4563 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4564 check_button_grid,
4565 NULL((void*)0),
4566 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_READ,
4567 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_READ,
4568 other_perm_label,
4569 is_folder);
4570
4571 w = add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4572 check_button_grid,
4573 w,
4574 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_WRITE,
4575 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_WRITE,
4576 other_perm_label,
4577 is_folder);
4578
4579 add_permissions_checkbox (window,
4580 check_button_grid,
4581 w,
4582 PERMISSIONS_CHECKBOXES_EXECUTE,
4583 UNIX_PERM_OTHER_EXEC,
4584 other_perm_label,
4585 is_folder);
4586}
4587
4588static void
4589create_advanced_permissions (FMPropertiesWindow *window, GtkGrid *page_grid)
4590{
4591 GtkLabel *group_label;
4592 GtkLabel *owner_label;
4593 gboolean has_directory, has_file;
4594
4595 if (!is_multi_file_window (window) && caja_file_can_set_owner (get_target_file (window))) {
4596 GtkComboBox *owner_combo_box;
4597
4598 owner_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("_Owner:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Owner:", 5));
4599 /* Combo box in this case. */
4600 owner_combo_box = attach_owner_combo_box (page_grid,
4601 GTK_WIDGET (owner_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_label))))),
4602 get_target_file (window));
4603 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (owner_label,
4604 GTK_WIDGET (owner_combo_box)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_combo_box))))));
4605 } else {
4606 GtkWidget *value;
4607 owner_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Owner:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Owner:", 5));
4608
4609 /* Static text in this case. */
4610 value = attach_value_field (window,
4611 page_grid,
4612 GTK_WIDGET (owner_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((owner_label))))),
4613 "owner",
4614 INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4615 FALSE(0));
4616 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (owner_label, value);
4617 }
4618
4619 if (!is_multi_file_window (window) && caja_file_can_set_group (get_target_file (window))) {
4620 GtkComboBox *group_combo_box;
4621
4622 group_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("_Group:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Group:", 5));
4623
4624 /* Combo box in this case. */
4625 group_combo_box = attach_group_combo_box (page_grid, GTK_WIDGET (group_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_label))))),
4626 get_target_file (window));
4627 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget (group_label,
4628 GTK_WIDGET (group_combo_box)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_combo_box))))));
4629 } else {
4630 group_label = attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Group:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Group:", 5));
4631
4632 /* Static text in this case. */
4633 attach_value_field (window, page_grid, GTK_WIDGET (group_label)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((group_label))))),
4634 "group",
4635 INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4636 FALSE(0));
4637 }
4638
4639 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4640
4641 has_directory = files_has_directory (window);
4642 has_file = files_has_file (window);
4643
4644 if (has_directory) {
4645 if (has_file || window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4646 attach_title_field (page_grid, _("Folder Permissions:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Folder Permissions:", 5));
4647 }
4648 create_permission_checkboxes (window, page_grid, TRUE(!(0)));
4649 }
4650
4651 if (has_file || window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4652 if (has_directory) {
4653 attach_title_field (page_grid, _("File Permissions:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "File Permissions:", 5));
4654 }
4655 create_permission_checkboxes (window, page_grid, FALSE(0));
4656 }
4657
4658 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4659 append_special_execution_flags (window, page_grid);
4660
4661 append_title_value_pair
4662 (window, page_grid, _("Text view:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Text view:", 5),
4663 "permissions", INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4664 FALSE(0));
4665}
4666
4667static void
4668set_recursive_permissions_done (gpointer callback_data)
4669{
4670 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
4671
4672 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (callback_data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((callback_data)))));
4673 end_long_operation (window);
4674
4675 g_object_unref (window);
4676}
4677
4678static void
4679apply_recursive_clicked (GtkWidget *recursive_button,
4680 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
4681{
4682 guint32 file_permission, file_permission_mask;
4683 guint32 dir_permission, dir_permission_mask;
4684 guint32 vfs_mask, vfs_new_perm, p;
4685 gboolean active, is_folder, is_special, use_original;
4686 GList *l;
4687 GtkTreeModel *model;
4688 GtkTreeIter iter;
4689 PermissionType type;
4690 int new_perm, mask;
4691 GtkWidget *button = NULL((void*)0);
4692 GtkWidget *combo = NULL((void*)0);
4693
4694 file_permission = 0;
4695 file_permission_mask = 0;
4696 dir_permission = 0;
4697 dir_permission_mask = 0;
4698
4699 /* Advanced mode and execute checkbox: */
4700 for (l = window->details->permission_buttons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4701 button = l->data;
4702
4703 if (gtk_toggle_button_get_inconsistent (GTK_TOGGLE_BUTTON (button)((((GtkToggleButton*) (void *) ((button))))))) {
4704 continue;
4705 }
4706
4707 active = gtk_toggle_button_get_active (GTK_TOGGLE_BUTTON (button)((((GtkToggleButton*) (void *) ((button))))));
4708 p = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (button),((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "permission")))
4709 "permission"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "permission")));
4710 is_folder = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (button),((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "is-folder")))
4711 "is-folder"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "is-folder")));
4712 is_special = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (button),((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "is-special")))
4713 "is-special"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
button))))), "is-special")));
4714
4715 if (is_folder || is_special) {
4716 dir_permission_mask |= p;
4717 if (active) {
4718 dir_permission |= p;
4719 }
4720 }
4721 if (!is_folder || is_special) {
4722 file_permission_mask |= p;
4723 if (active) {
4724 file_permission |= p;
4725 }
4726 }
4727 }
4728 /* Simple mode, minus exec checkbox */
4729 for (l = window->details->permission_combos; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4730 combo = l->data;
4731
4732 if (!gtk_combo_box_get_active_iter (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))), &iter)) {
4733 continue;
4734 }
4735
4736 type = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo), "permission-type"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "permission-type")));
4737 is_folder = GPOINTER_TO_INT (g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (combo),((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "is-folder")))
4738 "is-folder"))((gint) (glong) (g_object_get_data (((((GObject*) (void *) ((
combo))))), "is-folder")));
4739
4740 model = gtk_combo_box_get_model (GTK_COMBO_BOX (combo)((((GtkComboBox*) (void *) ((combo))))));
4741 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter, 1, &new_perm, 2, &use_original, -1);
4742 if (use_original) {
4743 continue;
4744 }
4745 vfs_new_perm = permission_to_vfs (type, new_perm);
4746
4747 if (is_folder) {
4748 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE|PERMISSION_EXEC;
4749 } else {
4750 mask = PERMISSION_READ|PERMISSION_WRITE;
4751 }
4752 vfs_mask = permission_to_vfs (type, mask);
4753
4754 if (is_folder) {
4755 dir_permission_mask |= vfs_mask;
4756 dir_permission |= vfs_new_perm;
4757 } else {
4758 file_permission_mask |= vfs_mask;
4759 file_permission |= vfs_new_perm;
4760 }
4761 }
4762
4763 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4764 CajaFile *file;
4765
4766 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4767
4768 if (caja_file_is_directory (file) &&
4769 caja_file_can_set_permissions (file)) {
4770 char *uri;
4771
4772 uri = caja_file_get_uri (file);
4773 start_long_operation (window);
4774 g_object_ref (window)((__typeof__ (window)) (g_object_ref) (window));
4775 caja_file_set_permissions_recursive (uri,
4776 file_permission,
4777 file_permission_mask,
4778 dir_permission,
4779 dir_permission_mask,
4780 set_recursive_permissions_done,
4781 window);
4782 g_free (uri);
4783 }
4784 }
4785}
4786
4787static void
4788create_permissions_page (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
4789{
4790 GtkWidget *vbox;
4791 GList *file_list;
4792
4793 vbox = create_page_with_vbox (window->details->notebook,
4794 _("Permissions")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Permissions", 5));
4795
4796 file_list = window->details->original_files;
4797
4798 window->details->initial_permissions = NULL((void*)0);
4799
4800 if (all_can_get_permissions (file_list) && all_can_get_permissions (window->details->target_files)) {
4801 GtkGrid *page_grid;
4802
4803 window->details->initial_permissions = get_initial_permissions (window->details->target_files);
4804 window->details->has_recursive_apply = files_has_changable_permissions_directory (window);
4805
4806 if (!all_can_set_permissions (file_list)) {
4807 add_prompt_and_separator (
4808 vbox,
4809 _("You are not the owner, so you cannot change these permissions.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "You are not the owner, so you cannot change these permissions."
, 5));
4810 }
4811
4812 page_grid = GTK_GRID (create_grid_with_standard_properties ())((((GtkGrid*) (void *) ((create_grid_with_standard_properties
())))));
4813
4814 gtk_widget_show (GTK_WIDGET (page_grid)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((page_grid))))));
4815 gtk_box_pack_start (GTK_BOX (vbox)((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((vbox))))),
4816 GTK_WIDGET (page_grid)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((page_grid))))),
4817 TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)), 0);
4818
4819 if (g_settings_get_boolean (caja_preferences, CAJA_PREFERENCES_SHOW_ADVANCED_PERMISSIONS"show-advanced-permissions")) {
4820 create_advanced_permissions (window, page_grid);
4821 } else {
4822 create_simple_permissions (window, page_grid);
4823 }
4824
4825 append_blank_slim_row (page_grid);
4826
4827#ifdef HAVE_SELINUX1
4828 append_title_value_pair
4829 (window, page_grid, _("SELinux context:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "SELinux context:", 5),
4830 "selinux_context", INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4831 FALSE(0));
4832#endif
4833 append_title_value_pair
4834 (window, page_grid, _("Last changed:")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Last changed:", 5),
4835 "date_permissions", INCONSISTENT_STATE_STRING"\xE2\x80\x92",
4836 FALSE(0));
4837
4838 if (window->details->has_recursive_apply) {
4839 GtkWidget *button, *hbox;
4840
4841 hbox = gtk_box_new (GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL, 0);
4842 gtk_widget_show (hbox);
4843 gtk_container_add_with_properties (GTK_CONTAINER (page_grid)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((page_grid))))), hbox,
4844 "width", 2,
4845 NULL((void*)0));
4846
4847 button = gtk_button_new_with_mnemonic (_("Apply Permissions to Enclosed Files")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Apply Permissions to Enclosed Files",
5));
4848 gtk_widget_show (button);
4849 gtk_box_pack_start (GTK_BOX (hbox)((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((hbox))))), button, FALSE(0), FALSE(0), 0);
4850 g_signal_connect (button, "clicked",g_signal_connect_data ((button), ("clicked"), (((GCallback) (
apply_recursive_clicked))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
4851 G_CALLBACK (apply_recursive_clicked),g_signal_connect_data ((button), ("clicked"), (((GCallback) (
apply_recursive_clicked))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
4852 window)g_signal_connect_data ((button), ("clicked"), (((GCallback) (
apply_recursive_clicked))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
4853 }
4854 } else {
4855 char *prompt_text;
4856
4857 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)) {
4858 char *file_name;
4859
4860 file_name = caja_file_get_display_name (get_target_file (window));
4861 prompt_text = g_strdup_printf (_("The permissions of \"%s\" could not be determined.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "The permissions of \"%s\" could not be determined."
, 5), file_name);
4862 g_free (file_name);
4863 } else {
4864 prompt_text = g_strdup (_("The permissions of the selected file could not be determined."))g_strdup_inline (dcgettext (((void*)0), "The permissions of the selected file could not be determined."
, 5));
4865 }
4866
4867 add_prompt (vbox, prompt_text, TRUE(!(0)));
4868 g_free (prompt_text);
4869 }
4870}
4871
4872static void
4873append_extension_pages (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
4874{
4875 GList *providers;
4876 GList *module_providers;
4877 GList *p;
4878
4879 providers = caja_extensions_get_for_type (CAJA_TYPE_PROPERTY_PAGE_PROVIDER(caja_property_page_provider_get_type ()));
4880
4881 /* FIXME: we also need the property pages from two old modules that
4882 * are not registered as proper extensions. This is going to work
4883 * this way until some generic solution is introduced.
4884 */
4885 module_providers = caja_module_get_extensions_for_type (CAJA_TYPE_PROPERTY_PAGE_PROVIDER(caja_property_page_provider_get_type ()));
4886 for (p = module_providers; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next) {
4887 const gchar *type_name = G_OBJECT_TYPE_NAME (G_OBJECT (p->data))(g_type_name ((((((GTypeClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) (((((GObject
*) (void *) ((p->data)))))))->g_class))->g_type)))));
4888 if (g_strcmp0 (type_name, "CajaNotesViewerProvider") == 0 ||
4889 g_strcmp0 (type_name, "CajaImagePropertiesPageProvider") == 0) {
4890 providers = g_list_prepend (providers, p->data);
4891 }
4892 }
4893
4894 for (p = providers; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next) {
4895 CajaPropertyPageProvider *provider;
4896 GList *pages;
4897 GList *l;
4898
4899 provider = CAJA_PROPERTY_PAGE_PROVIDER (p->data)((((CajaPropertyPageProvider*) (void *) ((p->data)))));
4900
4901 pages = caja_property_page_provider_get_pages
4902 (provider, window->details->original_files);
4903
4904 for (l = pages; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4905 CajaPropertyPage *page;
4906 GtkWidget *page_widget;
4907 GtkWidget *label;
4908
4909 page = CAJA_PROPERTY_PAGE (l->data)((((CajaPropertyPage*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
4910
4911 g_object_get (G_OBJECT (page)((((GObject*) (void *) ((page))))),
4912 "page", &page_widget, "label", &label,
4913 NULL((void*)0));
4914
4915 gtk_notebook_append_page (window->details->notebook,
4916 page_widget, label);
4917
4918 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (page_widget)((((GObject*) (void *) ((page_widget))))),
4919 "is-extension-page",
4920 page);
4921
4922 g_object_unref (page_widget);
4923 g_object_unref (label);
4924
4925 g_object_unref (page);
4926 }
4927
4928 g_list_free (pages);
4929 }
4930
4931 caja_module_extension_list_free (providers);
4932}
4933
4934static gboolean
4935should_show_emblems (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
4936{
4937 /* FIXME bugzilla.gnome.org 45643:
4938 * Emblems aren't displayed on the the desktop Trash icon, so
4939 * we shouldn't pretend that they work by showing them here.
4940 * When bug 5643 is fixed we can remove this case.
4941 */
4942 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)
4943 && is_merged_trash_directory (get_target_file (window))) {
4944 return FALSE(0);
4945 }
4946
4947 return TRUE(!(0));
4948}
4949
4950static gboolean
4951should_show_permissions (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
4952{
4953 CajaFile *file;
4954
4955 file = get_target_file (window);
4956
4957 /* Don't show permissions for Trash and Computer since they're not
4958 * really file system objects.
4959 */
4960 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)
4961 && (is_merged_trash_directory (file) ||
4962 is_computer_directory (file))) {
4963 return FALSE(0);
4964 }
4965
4966 return TRUE(!(0));
4967}
4968
4969static char *
4970get_pending_key (GList *file_list)
4971{
4972 GList *l;
4973 GList *uris;
4974 GString *key;
4975 char *ret;
4976
4977 uris = NULL((void*)0);
4978 for (l = file_list; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4979 uris = g_list_prepend (uris, caja_file_get_uri (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))))));
4980 }
4981 uris = g_list_sort (uris, (GCompareFunc)strcmp);
4982
4983 key = g_string_new ("");
4984 for (l = uris; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
4985 g_string_append (key, l->data)(__builtin_constant_p (l->data) ? __extension__ ({ const char
* const __val = (l->data); g_string_append_len_inline (key
, __val, (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_363
; if (__val != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_363 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_363
= 0; _g_boolean_var_363; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val)
+ !(__val))) : (gssize) -1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline
(key, l->data, (gssize) -1));
4986 g_string_append (key, ";")(__builtin_constant_p (";") ? __extension__ ({ const char * const
__val = (";"); g_string_append_len_inline (key, __val, (__builtin_expect
(__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_364; if (__val != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_364 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_364 = 0; _g_boolean_var_364
; }), 1)) ? (gssize) strlen (((__val) + !(__val))) : (gssize)
-1); }) : g_string_append_len_inline (key, ";", (gssize) -1)
);
4987 }
4988
4989 g_list_free_full (uris, g_free);
4990
4991 ret = key->str;
4992 g_string_free (key, FALSE)(__builtin_constant_p ((0)) ? (((0)) ? (g_string_free) ((key)
, ((0))) : g_string_free_and_steal (key)) : (g_string_free) (
(key), ((0))));
4993
4994 return ret;
4995}
4996
4997static StartupData *
4998startup_data_new (GList *original_files,
4999 GList *target_files,
5000 const char *pending_key,
5001 GtkWidget *parent_widget)
5002{
5003 StartupData *data;
5004 GList *l;
5005
5006 data = g_new0 (StartupData, 1)(StartupData *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) (1); gsize
__s = sizeof (StartupData); gpointer __p; if (__s == 1) __p =
g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p (__n) &&
(__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L *2UL+1UL) / __s
)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s
); __p; }));
5007 data->original_files = caja_file_list_copy (original_files);
5008 data->target_files = caja_file_list_copy (target_files);
5009 data->parent_widget = parent_widget;
5010 data->pending_key = g_strdup (pending_key)g_strdup_inline (pending_key);
5011 data->pending_files = g_hash_table_new (g_direct_hash,
5012 g_direct_equal);
5013
5014 for (l = data->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5015 g_hash_table_insert (data->pending_files, l->data, l->data);
5016 }
5017
5018 return data;
5019}
5020
5021static void
5022startup_data_free (StartupData *data)
5023{
5024 caja_file_list_free (data->original_files);
5025 caja_file_list_free (data->target_files);
5026 g_hash_table_destroy (data->pending_files);
5027 g_free (data->pending_key);
5028 g_free (data);
5029}
5030
5031static void
5032file_changed_callback (CajaFile *file, gpointer user_data)
5033{
5034 FMPropertiesWindow *window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (user_data)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((user_data)))));
5035
5036 if (!g_list_find (window->details->changed_files, file)) {
5037 caja_file_ref (file);
5038 window->details->changed_files = g_list_prepend (window->details->changed_files, file);
5039
5040 schedule_files_update (window);
5041 }
5042}
5043
5044static gboolean
5045is_a_special_file (CajaFile *file)
5046{
5047 if (file == NULL((void*)0) ||
5048 CAJA_IS_DESKTOP_ICON_FILE (file)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(file)); GType __t = (caja_desktop_icon_file_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))) ||
5049 is_merged_trash_directory (file) ||
5050 is_computer_directory (file)) {
5051 return TRUE(!(0));
5052 }
5053 return FALSE(0);
5054}
5055
5056static gboolean
5057should_show_open_with (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5058{
5059 CajaFile *file;
5060
5061 /* Don't show open with tab for desktop special icons (trash, etc)
5062 * We don't get the open-with menu for these anyway.
5063 *
5064 * Also don't show it for folders. Changing the default app for folders
5065 * leads to all sort of hard to understand errors.
5066 */
5067
5068 if (is_multi_file_window (window)) {
5069 if (!file_list_attributes_identical (window->details->original_files,
5070 "mime_type")) {
5071 return FALSE(0);
5072 } else {
5073
5074 GList *l;
5075
5076 for (l = window->details->original_files; l; l = l->next) {
5077 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
5078 if (caja_file_is_directory (file) ||
5079 is_a_special_file (file)) {
5080 return FALSE(0);
5081 }
5082 }
5083 }
5084 } else {
5085 file = get_original_file (window);
5086 if (caja_file_is_directory (file) ||
5087 is_a_special_file (file)) {
5088 return FALSE(0);
5089 }
5090 }
5091 return TRUE(!(0));
5092}
5093
5094static void
5095create_open_with_page (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5096{
5097 GtkWidget *vbox;
5098 char *mime_type;
5099
5100 mime_type = caja_file_get_mime_type (get_target_file (window));
5101
5102 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)) {
5103 char *uri;
5104
5105 uri = caja_file_get_uri (get_target_file (window));
5106
5107 if (uri == NULL((void*)0)) {
5108 return;
5109 }
5110
5111 vbox = caja_mime_application_chooser_new (uri, mime_type);
5112
5113 g_free (uri);
5114 } else {
5115 GList *uris;
5116
5117 uris = window->details->original_files;
5118 if (uris == NULL((void*)0)) {
5119 return;
5120 }
5121 vbox = caja_mime_application_chooser_new_for_multiple_files (uris, mime_type);
5122 }
5123
5124 gtk_widget_show (vbox);
5125 g_free (mime_type);
5126
5127 gtk_notebook_append_page (window->details->notebook,
5128 vbox, gtk_label_new (_("Open With")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Open With", 5)));
5129}
5130
5131static FMPropertiesWindow *
5132create_properties_window (StartupData *startup_data)
5133{
5134 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
5135 GList *l;
5136 GtkWidget *action_area;
5137
5138 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (gtk_widget_new (fm_properties_window_get_type (), NULL))((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_new (fm_properties_window_get_type
(), ((void*)0)))))));
5139
5140 window->details->original_files = caja_file_list_copy (startup_data->original_files);
5141
5142 window->details->target_files = caja_file_list_copy (startup_data->target_files);
5143
5144 gtk_window_set_screen (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))),
5145 gtk_widget_get_screen (startup_data->parent_widget));
5146
5147 gtk_window_set_type_hint (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))), GDK_WINDOW_TYPE_HINT_DIALOG);
5148
5149 /* Set initial window title */
5150 update_properties_window_title (window);
5151
5152 /* Start monitoring the file attributes we display. Note that some
5153 * of the attributes are for the original file, and some for the
5154 * target files.
5155 */
5156
5157 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5158 CajaFile *file;
5159 CajaFileAttributes attributes;
5160
5161 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
5162
5163 attributes =
5164 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTES_FOR_ICON(CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_INFO | CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_LINK_INFO | CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_THUMBNAIL
) |
5165 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_INFO |
5166 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_LINK_INFO;
5167
5168 caja_file_monitor_add (file,
5169 &window->details->original_files,
5170 attributes);
5171 }
5172
5173 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5174 CajaFile *file;
5175 CajaFileAttributes attributes;
5176
5177 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
5178
5179 attributes = 0;
5180 if (caja_file_is_directory (file)) {
5181 attributes |= CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DEEP_COUNTS;
5182 }
5183
5184 attributes |= CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_INFO;
5185 caja_file_monitor_add (file, &window->details->target_files, attributes);
5186 }
5187
5188 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5189 g_signal_connect_object (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))),
5190 "changed",
5191 G_CALLBACK (file_changed_callback)((GCallback) (file_changed_callback)),
5192 G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))),
5193 0);
5194 }
5195
5196 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5197 g_signal_connect_object (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))),
5198 "changed",
5199 G_CALLBACK (file_changed_callback)((GCallback) (file_changed_callback)),
5200 G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))),
5201 0);
5202 }
5203
5204 /* Create the notebook tabs. */
5205 window->details->notebook = GTK_NOTEBOOK (gtk_notebook_new ())((((GtkNotebook*) (void *) ((gtk_notebook_new ())))));
5206
5207 gtk_widget_add_events (GTK_WIDGET (window->details->notebook)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)))
)), GDK_SCROLL_MASK);
5208 g_signal_connect (window->details->notebook,g_signal_connect_data ((window->details->notebook), ("scroll-event"
), (((GCallback) (eel_notebook_scroll_event_cb))), (((void*)0
)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5209 "scroll-event",g_signal_connect_data ((window->details->notebook), ("scroll-event"
), (((GCallback) (eel_notebook_scroll_event_cb))), (((void*)0
)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5210 G_CALLBACK (eel_notebook_scroll_event_cb),g_signal_connect_data ((window->details->notebook), ("scroll-event"
), (((GCallback) (eel_notebook_scroll_event_cb))), (((void*)0
)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5211 NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((window->details->notebook), ("scroll-event"
), (((GCallback) (eel_notebook_scroll_event_cb))), (((void*)0
)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5212
5213 gtk_widget_show (GTK_WIDGET (window->details->notebook)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)))
)));
5214 gtk_box_pack_start (GTK_BOX (gtk_dialog_get_content_area (GTK_DIALOG (window)))((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((gtk_dialog_get_content_area (((((GtkDialog
*) (void *) ((window))))))))))),
5215 GTK_WIDGET (window->details->notebook)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((window->details->notebook)))
)),
5216 TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)), 0);
5217
5218 /* Create the pages. */
5219 create_basic_page (window);
5220
5221 if (should_show_emblems (window)) {
5222 create_emblems_page (window);
5223 }
5224
5225 if (should_show_permissions (window)) {
5226 create_permissions_page (window);
5227 }
5228
5229 if (should_show_open_with (window)) {
5230 create_open_with_page (window);
5231 }
5232
5233 /* append pages from available views */
5234 append_extension_pages (window);
5235
5236 eel_dialog_add_button (GTK_DIALOG (window)((((GtkDialog*) (void *) ((window))))),
5237 _("_Help")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Help", 5),
5238 "help-browser",
5239 GTK_RESPONSE_HELP);
5240
5241 action_area = gtk_widget_get_parent (eel_dialog_add_button (GTK_DIALOG (window)((((GtkDialog*) (void *) ((window))))),
5242 _("_Close")dcgettext (((void*)0), "_Close", 5),
5243 "window-close",
5244 GTK_RESPONSE_CLOSE));
5245
5246 /* FIXME - HIGificiation, should be done inside GTK+ */
5247 gtk_container_set_border_width (GTK_CONTAINER (gtk_dialog_get_content_area (GTK_DIALOG (window)))((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((gtk_dialog_get_content_area (((
((GtkDialog*) (void *) ((window))))))))))), 12);
5248 gtk_container_set_border_width (GTK_CONTAINER (action_area)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((action_area))))), 0);
5249 gtk_box_set_spacing (GTK_BOX (gtk_dialog_get_content_area (GTK_DIALOG (window)))((((GtkBox*) (void *) ((gtk_dialog_get_content_area (((((GtkDialog
*) (void *) ((window))))))))))), 12);
5250
5251 /* Update from initial state */
5252 properties_window_update (window, NULL((void*)0));
5253
5254 return window;
5255}
5256
5257static GList *
5258get_target_file_list (GList *original_files)
5259{
5260 GList *ret;
5261 GList *l;
5262
5263 ret = NULL((void*)0);
5264
5265 for (l = original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5266 CajaFile *target;
5267
5268 target = get_target_file_for_original_file (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))));
5269
5270 ret = g_list_prepend (ret, target);
5271 }
5272
5273 ret = g_list_reverse (ret);
5274
5275 return ret;
5276}
5277
5278static void
5279add_window (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5280{
5281 if (!is_multi_file_window (window)) {
5282 g_hash_table_insert (windows,
5283 get_original_file (window),
5284 window);
5285 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))), "window_key",
5286 get_original_file (window));
5287 }
5288}
5289
5290static void
5291remove_window (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5292{
5293 gpointer key;
5294
5295 key = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (window)((((GObject*) (void *) ((window))))), "window_key");
5296 if (key) {
5297 g_hash_table_remove (windows, key);
5298 }
5299}
5300
5301static GtkWindow *
5302get_existing_window (GList *file_list)
5303{
5304 if (!file_list->next) {
5305 return g_hash_table_lookup (windows, file_list->data);
5306 }
5307
5308 return NULL((void*)0);
5309}
5310
5311static void
5312cancel_create_properties_window_callback (gpointer callback_data)
5313{
5314 remove_pending ((StartupData *)callback_data, TRUE(!(0)), FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)));
5315}
5316
5317static void
5318parent_widget_destroyed_callback (GtkWidget *widget, gpointer callback_data)
5319{
5320 g_assert (widget == ((StartupData *)callback_data)->parent_widget)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_365
; if (widget == ((StartupData *)callback_data)->parent_widget
) _g_boolean_var_365 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_365 = 0; _g_boolean_var_365
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 5320, ((const char*) (__func__)), "widget == ((StartupData *)callback_data)->parent_widget"
); } while (0);
5321
5322 remove_pending ((StartupData *)callback_data, TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)), FALSE(0));
5323}
5324
5325static void
5326cancel_call_when_ready_callback (gpointer key,
5327 gpointer value,
5328 gpointer user_data)
5329{
5330 caja_file_cancel_call_when_ready
5331 (CAJA_FILE (key)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((key))))),
5332 is_directory_ready_callback,
5333 user_data);
5334}
5335
5336static void
5337remove_pending (StartupData *startup_data,
5338 gboolean cancel_call_when_ready,
5339 gboolean cancel_timed_wait,
5340 gboolean cancel_destroy_handler)
5341{
5342 if (cancel_call_when_ready) {
5343 g_hash_table_foreach (startup_data->pending_files,
5344 cancel_call_when_ready_callback,
5345 startup_data);
5346
5347 }
5348 if (cancel_timed_wait) {
5349 eel_timed_wait_stop
5350 (cancel_create_properties_window_callback, startup_data);
5351 }
5352 if (cancel_destroy_handler) {
5353 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func (startup_data->parent_widget,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((startup_data->parent_widget
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (parent_widget_destroyed_callback
))), (startup_data))
5354 G_CALLBACK (parent_widget_destroyed_callback),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((startup_data->parent_widget
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (parent_widget_destroyed_callback
))), (startup_data))
5355 startup_data)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((startup_data->parent_widget
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (((GCallback) (parent_widget_destroyed_callback
))), (startup_data));
5356 }
5357
5358 g_hash_table_remove (pending_lists, startup_data->pending_key);
5359
5360 startup_data_free (startup_data);
5361}
5362
5363static void
5364is_directory_ready_callback (CajaFile *file,
5365 gpointer data)
5366{
5367 StartupData *startup_data;
5368
5369 startup_data = data;
5370
5371 g_hash_table_remove (startup_data->pending_files, file);
5372
5373 if (g_hash_table_size (startup_data->pending_files) == 0) {
5374 FMPropertiesWindow *new_window;
5375
5376 new_window = create_properties_window (startup_data);
5377
5378 add_window (new_window);
5379
5380 remove_pending (startup_data, FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)));
5381
5382 gtk_window_present (GTK_WINDOW (new_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((new_window))))));
5383 }
5384}
5385
5386void
5387fm_properties_window_present (GList *original_files,
5388 GtkWidget *parent_widget)
5389{
5390 GList *l, *next;
5391 GtkWidget *parent_window;
5392 StartupData *startup_data;
5393 GList *target_files;
5394 GtkWindow *existing_window;
5395 char *pending_key;
5396
5397 g_return_if_fail (original_files != NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_366
; if (original_files != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_366 = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_366 = 0; _g_boolean_var_366; }), 1))) { } else
{ g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__
)), "original_files != NULL"); return; } } while (0);
5398 g_return_if_fail (GTK_IS_WIDGET (parent_widget))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_367
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((parent_widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_widget_get_type ()));
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_367 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_367 = 0; _g_boolean_var_367
; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0),
((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_WIDGET (parent_widget)")
; return; } } while (0);
5399
5400 /* Create the hash tables first time through. */
5401 if (windows == NULL((void*)0)) {
5402 windows = eel_g_hash_table_new_free_at_exit
5403 (NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), "property windows");
5404 }
5405
5406 if (pending_lists == NULL((void*)0)) {
5407 pending_lists = eel_g_hash_table_new_free_at_exit
5408 (g_str_hash, g_str_equal, "pending property window files");
5409 }
5410
5411 /* Look to see if there's already a window for this file. */
5412 existing_window = get_existing_window (original_files);
5413 if (existing_window != NULL((void*)0)) {
5414 gtk_window_set_screen (existing_window,
5415 gtk_widget_get_screen (parent_widget));
5416 gtk_window_present (existing_window);
5417 return;
5418 }
5419
5420 pending_key = get_pending_key (original_files);
5421
5422 /* Look to see if we're already waiting for a window for this file. */
5423 if (g_hash_table_lookup (pending_lists, pending_key) != NULL((void*)0)) {
5424 return;
5425 }
5426
5427 target_files = get_target_file_list (original_files);
5428
5429 startup_data = startup_data_new (original_files,
5430 target_files,
5431 pending_key,
5432 parent_widget);
5433
5434 caja_file_list_free (target_files);
5435 g_free(pending_key);
5436
5437 /* Wait until we can tell whether it's a directory before showing, since
5438 * some one-time layout decisions depend on that info.
5439 */
5440
5441 g_hash_table_insert (pending_lists, startup_data->pending_key, startup_data->pending_key);
5442 g_signal_connect (parent_widget, "destroy",g_signal_connect_data ((parent_widget), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (parent_widget_destroyed_callback))), (startup_data), ((void
*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5443 G_CALLBACK (parent_widget_destroyed_callback), startup_data)g_signal_connect_data ((parent_widget), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (parent_widget_destroyed_callback))), (startup_data), ((void
*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5444
5445 parent_window = gtk_widget_get_ancestor (parent_widget, GTK_TYPE_WINDOW(gtk_window_get_type ()));
5446
5447 eel_timed_wait_start
5448 (cancel_create_properties_window_callback,
5449 startup_data,
5450 _("Creating Properties window.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Creating Properties window.", 5),
5451 parent_window == NULL((void*)0) ? NULL((void*)0) : GTK_WINDOW (parent_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((parent_window))))));
5452
5453 for (l = startup_data->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = next) {
5454 next = l->next;
5455 caja_file_call_when_ready
5456 (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))),
5457 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_INFO,
5458 is_directory_ready_callback,
5459 startup_data);
5460 }
5461}
5462
5463static void
5464real_response (GtkDialog *dialog,
5465 int response)
5466{
5467 GError *error = NULL((void*)0);
5468
5469 switch (response) {
5470 case GTK_RESPONSE_HELP:
5471 gtk_show_uri_on_window (GTK_WINDOW (dialog)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((dialog))))),
5472 "help:mate-user-guide/goscaja-51",
5473 gtk_get_current_event_time (),
5474 &error);
5475 if (error != NULL((void*)0)) {
5476 eel_show_error_dialog (_("There was an error displaying help.")dcgettext (((void*)0), "There was an error displaying help.",
5), error->message,
5477 GTK_WINDOW (dialog)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((dialog))))));
5478 g_error_free (error);
5479 }
5480 break;
5481
5482 case GTK_RESPONSE_NONE:
5483 case GTK_RESPONSE_CLOSE:
5484 case GTK_RESPONSE_DELETE_EVENT:
5485 gtk_widget_destroy (GTK_WIDGET (dialog)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((dialog))))));
5486 break;
5487
5488 default:
5489 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 5489, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
5490 break;
5491 }
5492}
5493
5494static void
5495real_destroy (GtkWidget *object)
5496{
5497 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
5498 GList *l;
5499
5500 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (object)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((object)))));
5501
5502 remove_window (window);
5503
5504 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5505 caja_file_monitor_remove (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))), &window->details->original_files);
5506 }
5507 caja_file_list_free (window->details->original_files);
5508 window->details->original_files = NULL((void*)0);
5509
5510 for (l = window->details->target_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5511 caja_file_monitor_remove (CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data))))), &window->details->target_files);
5512 }
5513 caja_file_list_free (window->details->target_files);
5514 window->details->target_files = NULL((void*)0);
5515
5516 caja_file_list_free (window->details->changed_files);
5517 window->details->changed_files = NULL((void*)0);
5518
5519 window->details->name_field = NULL((void*)0);
5520
5521 g_list_free (window->details->emblem_buttons);
5522 window->details->emblem_buttons = NULL((void*)0);
5523
5524 if (window->details->initial_emblems) {
5525 g_hash_table_destroy (window->details->initial_emblems);
5526 window->details->initial_emblems = NULL((void*)0);
5527 }
5528
5529 g_list_free (window->details->permission_buttons);
5530 window->details->permission_buttons = NULL((void*)0);
5531
5532 g_list_free (window->details->permission_combos);
5533 window->details->permission_combos = NULL((void*)0);
5534
5535 if (window->details->initial_permissions) {
5536 g_hash_table_destroy (window->details->initial_permissions);
5537 window->details->initial_permissions = NULL((void*)0);
5538 }
5539
5540 g_list_free (window->details->value_fields);
5541 window->details->value_fields = NULL((void*)0);
5542
5543 if (window->details->update_directory_contents_timeout_id != 0) {
5544 g_source_remove (window->details->update_directory_contents_timeout_id);
5545 window->details->update_directory_contents_timeout_id = 0;
5546 }
5547
5548 if (window->details->update_files_timeout_id != 0) {
5549 g_source_remove (window->details->update_files_timeout_id);
5550 window->details->update_files_timeout_id = 0;
5551 }
5552
5553 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (fm_properties_window_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((fm_properties_window_parent_class
)))))->destroy (object);
5554}
5555
5556static void
5557real_finalize (GObject *object)
5558{
5559 FMPropertiesWindow *window;
5560
5561 window = FM_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (object)((((FMPropertiesWindow*) (void *) ((object)))));
5562
5563 g_list_free_full (window->details->mime_list, g_free);
5564
5565 g_free (window->details->pending_name);
5566
5567 G_OBJECT_CLASS (fm_properties_window_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((fm_properties_window_parent_class
)))))->finalize (object);
5568}
5569
5570/* converts
5571 * file://foo/foobar/foofoo/bar
5572 * to
5573 * foofoo/bar
5574 * if
5575 * file://foo/foobar
5576 * is the parent
5577 *
5578 * It does not resolve any symlinks.
5579 * */
5580static char *
5581make_relative_uri_from_full (const char *uri,
5582 const char *base_uri)
5583{
5584 g_assert (uri != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_368
; if (uri != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_368 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_368
= 0; _g_boolean_var_368; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 5584, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "uri != NULL"); } while (0);
5585 g_assert (base_uri != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_369
; if (base_uri != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_369 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_369
= 0; _g_boolean_var_369; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 5585, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "base_uri != NULL"); } while (0);
5586
5587 if (g_str_has_prefix (uri, base_uri)(__builtin_constant_p (base_uri)? __extension__ ({ const char
* const __str = (uri); const char * const __prefix = (base_uri
); gboolean __result = (0); if (__builtin_expect (__extension__
({ int _g_boolean_var_370; if (__str == ((void*)0) || __prefix
== ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_370 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_370
= 0; _g_boolean_var_370; }), 0)) __result = (g_str_has_prefix
) (__str, __prefix); else { const size_t __str_len = strlen (
((__str) + !(__str))); const size_t __prefix_len = strlen (((
__prefix) + !(__prefix))); if (__str_len >= __prefix_len) __result
= memcmp (((__str) + !(__str)), ((__prefix) + !(__prefix)), __prefix_len
) == 0; } __result; }) : (g_str_has_prefix) (uri, base_uri) )) {
5588 uri += strlen (base_uri);
5589 if (*uri != '/') {
5590 return NULL((void*)0);
5591 }
5592
5593 while (*uri == '/') {
5594 uri++;
5595 }
5596
5597 if (*uri != '\0') {
5598 return g_strdup (uri)g_strdup_inline (uri);
5599 }
5600 }
5601
5602 return NULL((void*)0);
5603}
5604
5605/* icon selection callback to set the image of the file object to the selected file */
5606static void
5607set_icon (const char* icon_uri, FMPropertiesWindow *properties_window)
5608{
5609 char *icon_path;
5610
5611 g_assert (icon_uri != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_371
; if (icon_uri != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_371 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_371
= 0; _g_boolean_var_371; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 5611, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "icon_uri != NULL"); } while (0);
5612 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (properties_window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_372
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((properties_window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type
()); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_372 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_372 =
0; _g_boolean_var_372; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c", 5612, ((const char*
) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (properties_window)")
; } while (0);
5613
5614 icon_path = g_filename_from_uri (icon_uri, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5615 /* we don't allow remote URIs */
5616 if (icon_path != NULL((void*)0)) {
5617 GList *l;
5618 CajaFile *file = NULL((void*)0);
5619
5620 for (l = properties_window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5621 char *file_uri;
5622
5623 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
5624
5625 file_uri = caja_file_get_uri (file);
5626
5627 if (caja_file_is_mime_type (file, "application/x-desktop")) {
5628 if (caja_link_local_set_icon (file_uri, icon_path)) {
5629 caja_file_invalidate_attributes (file,
5630 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_INFO |
5631 CAJA_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_LINK_INFO);
5632 }
5633 } else {
5634 char *real_icon_uri;
5635
5636 real_icon_uri = make_relative_uri_from_full (icon_uri, file_uri);
5637
5638 if (real_icon_uri == NULL((void*)0)) {
5639 real_icon_uri = g_strdup (icon_uri)g_strdup_inline (icon_uri);
5640 }
5641
5642 caja_file_set_metadata (file, CAJA_METADATA_KEY_CUSTOM_ICON"custom-icon", NULL((void*)0), real_icon_uri);
5643 caja_file_set_metadata (file, CAJA_METADATA_KEY_ICON_SCALE"icon-scale", NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5644
5645 g_free (real_icon_uri);
5646 }
5647
5648 g_free (file_uri);
5649 }
5650
5651 g_free (icon_path);
5652 }
5653}
5654
5655static void
5656update_preview_callback (GtkFileChooser *icon_chooser,
5657 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5658{
5659 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf, *scaled_pixbuf;
5660 char *filename;
5661
5662 pixbuf = NULL((void*)0);
5663
5664 filename = gtk_file_chooser_get_filename (icon_chooser);
5665 if (filename != NULL((void*)0)) {
5666 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file (filename, NULL((void*)0));
5667 }
5668
5669 if (pixbuf != NULL((void*)0)) {
5670 GtkWidget *preview_widget;
5671
5672 preview_widget = gtk_file_chooser_get_preview_widget (icon_chooser);
5673 gtk_file_chooser_set_preview_widget_active (icon_chooser, TRUE(!(0)));
5674
5675 if (gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf) > PREVIEW_IMAGE_WIDTH96) {
5676 double scale;
5677 gint height;
5678 gint width;
5679
5680 height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf);
5681 width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf);
5682 scale = ((double) height) / ((double) width);
5683
5684 scaled_pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_scale_simple
5685 (pixbuf,
5686 PREVIEW_IMAGE_WIDTH96,
5687 (int) (scale * (double) PREVIEW_IMAGE_WIDTH96),
5688 GDK_INTERP_HYPER);
5689 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
5690 pixbuf = scaled_pixbuf;
5691 }
5692
5693 gtk_image_set_from_pixbuf (GTK_IMAGE (preview_widget)((((GtkImage*) (void *) ((preview_widget))))), pixbuf);
5694 } else {
5695 gtk_file_chooser_set_preview_widget_active (icon_chooser, FALSE(0));
5696 }
5697
5698 g_free (filename);
5699
5700 if (pixbuf != NULL((void*)0)) {
5701 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
5702 }
5703}
5704
5705static void
5706custom_icon_file_chooser_response_cb (GtkDialog *dialog,
5707 gint response,
5708 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5709{
5710 char *uri;
5711
5712 switch (response) {
5713 case GTK_RESPONSE_NO:
5714 reset_icon (window);
5715 break;
5716
5717 case GTK_RESPONSE_OK:
5718 uri = gtk_file_chooser_get_uri (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))));
5719 set_icon (uri, window);
5720 g_free (uri);
5721 break;
5722
5723 default:
5724 break;
5725 }
5726
5727 gtk_widget_hide (GTK_WIDGET (dialog)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((dialog))))));
5728}
5729
5730static void
5731select_image_button_callback (GtkWidget *widget,
5732 FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5733{
5734 GtkWidget *dialog;
5735 GList *l;
5736 CajaFile *file;
5737 char *image_path;
5738 gboolean revert_is_sensitive;
5739
5740 g_assert (FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_373
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((window)); GType __t = (fm_properties_window_get_type());
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) _g_boolean_var_373 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_373 = 0; _g_boolean_var_373
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "fm-properties-window.c"
, 5740, ((const char*) (__func__)), "FM_IS_PROPERTIES_WINDOW (window)"
); } while (0);
5741
5742 dialog = window->details->icon_chooser;
5743
5744 if (dialog == NULL((void*)0)) {
5745 GtkWidget *preview;
5746 GtkFileFilter *filter;
5747
5748 dialog = eel_file_chooser_dialog_new (_("Select Custom Icon")dcgettext (((void*)0), "Select Custom Icon", 5), GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((window))))),
5749 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN,
5750 "document-revert", GTK_RESPONSE_NO,
5751 "process-stop", GTK_RESPONSE_CANCEL,
5752 "document-open", GTK_RESPONSE_OK,
5753 NULL((void*)0));
5754 gtk_file_chooser_add_shortcut_folder (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), ICONDIR"/usr/local/share/icons", NULL((void*)0));
5755 gtk_file_chooser_add_shortcut_folder (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), PIXMAPDIR"/usr/local/share/pixmaps", NULL((void*)0));
5756 gtk_window_set_destroy_with_parent (GTK_WINDOW (dialog)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((dialog))))), TRUE(!(0)));
5757
5758 filter = gtk_file_filter_new ();
5759 gtk_file_filter_add_pixbuf_formats (filter);
5760 gtk_file_chooser_set_filter (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), filter);
5761
5762 preview = gtk_image_new ();
5763 gtk_widget_set_size_request (preview, PREVIEW_IMAGE_WIDTH96, -1);
5764 gtk_file_chooser_set_preview_widget (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), preview);
5765 gtk_file_chooser_set_use_preview_label (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), FALSE(0));
5766 gtk_file_chooser_set_preview_widget_active (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), FALSE(0));
5767
5768 g_signal_connect (dialog, "update-preview",g_signal_connect_data ((dialog), ("update-preview"), (((GCallback
) (update_preview_callback))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
5769 G_CALLBACK (update_preview_callback), window)g_signal_connect_data ((dialog), ("update-preview"), (((GCallback
) (update_preview_callback))), (window), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
5770
5771 window->details->icon_chooser = dialog;
5772
5773 g_object_add_weak_pointer (G_OBJECT (dialog)((((GObject*) (void *) ((dialog))))),
5774 (gpointer *) &window->details->icon_chooser);
5775 }
5776
5777 /* it's likely that the user wants to pick an icon that is inside a local directory */
5778 if (g_list_length (window->details->original_files) == 1) {
5779 file = CAJA_FILE (window->details->original_files->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((window->details->original_files
->data)))));
5780
5781 if (caja_file_is_directory (file)) {
5782 char *uri;
5783
5784 uri = caja_file_get_uri (file);
5785
5786 image_path = g_filename_from_uri (uri, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5787 if (image_path != NULL((void*)0)) {
5788 gtk_file_chooser_set_current_folder (GTK_FILE_CHOOSER (dialog)((((GtkFileChooser*) (void *) ((dialog))))), image_path);
5789 g_free (image_path);
5790 }
5791
5792 g_free (uri);
5793 }
5794 }
5795
5796 revert_is_sensitive = FALSE(0);
5797 for (l = window->details->original_files; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
5798 file = CAJA_FILE (l->data)((((CajaFile*) (void *) ((l->data)))));
5799 image_path = caja_file_get_metadata (file, CAJA_METADATA_KEY_CUSTOM_ICON"custom-icon", NULL((void*)0));
5800 revert_is_sensitive = (image_path != NULL((void*)0));
5801 g_free (image_path);
5802
5803 if (revert_is_sensitive) {
5804 break;
5805 }
5806 }
5807 gtk_dialog_set_response_sensitive (GTK_DIALOG (dialog)((((GtkDialog*) (void *) ((dialog))))), GTK_RESPONSE_NO, revert_is_sensitive);
5808
5809 g_signal_connect (dialog, "response",g_signal_connect_data ((dialog), ("response"), (((GCallback) (
custom_icon_file_chooser_response_cb))), (window), ((void*)0)
, (GConnectFlags) 0)
5810 G_CALLBACK (custom_icon_file_chooser_response_cb), window)g_signal_connect_data ((dialog), ("response"), (((GCallback) (
custom_icon_file_chooser_response_cb))), (window), ((void*)0)
, (GConnectFlags) 0);
5811 gtk_widget_show (dialog);
5812}
5813
5814static void
5815fm_properties_window_class_init (FMPropertiesWindowClass *class)
5816{
5817 GtkBindingSet *binding_set;
5818
5819 G_OBJECT_CLASS (class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->finalize = real_finalize;
5820
5821 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->destroy = real_destroy;
5822
5823 GTK_DIALOG_CLASS (class)((((GtkDialogClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->response = real_response;
5824
5825 binding_set = gtk_binding_set_by_class (class);
5826 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Escape0xff1b, 0,
5827 "close", 0);
5828}
5829
5830static void
5831fm_properties_window_init (FMPropertiesWindow *window)
5832{
5833 window->details = fm_properties_window_get_instance_private (window);
5834}
